content: 1 Then called he unto Moses,—and Yahweh spake unto him, out of the tent of meeting､ saying:
content_old: 1 Then called he unto Moses,—and Yahweh spake unto him, out of the tent of meeting､ saying:

content: 2 Speak thou unto the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them— When any man would bring near from among you an oblation､ unto Yahweh from the beasts､ from the herd or from the flock shall ye bring near your oblation.
content_old: 2 Speak thou unto the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them— When any man would bring near from among you an oblation､ unto Yahweh from the beasts､ from the herd or from the flock shall ye bring near your oblation.

content: 3 If an ascending-sacrifice be his oblation—of the herd a male without defect shall he bring near,—unto the entrance of the tent of meeting shall he bring it, for its acceptance､ before Yahweh.
content_old: 3 If an ascending-sacrifice be his oblation—of the herd a male without defect shall he bring near,—unto the entrance of the tent of meeting shall he bring it, for its acceptance､ before Yahweh.

content: 4 Then shall he lean his hand, upon the head of the ascending-sacrifice,—and it shall be accepted for him､ to put a propitiatory covering over him;
content_old: 4 Then shall he lean his hand, upon the head of the ascending-sacrifice,—and it shall be accepted for him､ to put a propitiatory covering over him;

content: 5 and he shall slay the young bullock before Yahweh,—and the sons of Aaron､ the priests､ shall bring near the blood, and shall dash the blood against the altar､ round about, even the altar that is at the entrance of the tent of meeting.
content_old: 5 and he shall slay the young bullock before Yahweh,—and the sons of Aaron､ the priests､ shall bring near the blood, and shall dash the blood against the altar､ round about, even the altar that is at the entrance of the tent of meeting.

content: 6 Then shall he flay the ascending-sacrifice,—and cut it up into its pieces.
content_old: 6 Then shall he flay the ascending-sacrifice,—and cut it up into its pieces.

content: 7 And the sons of Aaron the priest shall place fire､ upon the altar,—and arrange wood､ upon the fire.
content_old: 7 And the sons of Aaron the priest shall place fire､ upon the altar,—and arrange wood､ upon the fire.

content: 8 And the sons of Aaron､ the priests､ shall arrange the pieces, the head and the fat,—upon the wood､ that is on the fire, that is on the altar.
content_old: 8 And the sons of Aaron､ the priests､ shall arrange the pieces, the head and the fat,—upon the wood､ that is on the fire, that is on the altar.

content: 9 But its inwards and its legs shall they bathe with water,—then shall the priest make､ of the whole､ a perfume at the altar, an ascending-sacrifice､ an altar-flame of a satisfying odour unto Yahweh.
content_old: 9 But its inwards and its legs shall they bathe with water,—then shall the priest make､ of the whole､ a perfume at the altar, an ascending-sacrifice､ an altar-flame of a satisfying odour unto Yahweh.

content: 10 But if of the flock be his oblation,—of the sheep or of the goats､ for an ascending-sacrifice a male without defect shall he bring near.
content_old: 10 But if of the flock be his oblation,—of the sheep or of the goats､ for an ascending-sacrifice a male without defect shall he bring near.

content: 11 And he shall slay it on the side of the altar､ northward､before Yahweh,—and the sons of Aaron､ the priests､ shall dash its blood against the altar､ round about.
content_old: 11 And he shall slay it on the side of the altar､ northward､before Yahweh,—and the sons of Aaron､ the priests､ shall dash its blood against the altar､ round about.

content: 12 And he shall cut it up into its pieces, and its head､ and its fat,—and the priest shall arrange them upon the wood､ that is on the fire, that is on the altar.
content_old: 12 And he shall cut it up into its pieces, and its head､ and its fat,—and the priest shall arrange them upon the wood､ that is on the fire, that is on the altar.

content: 13 But the inwards and the legs shall he bathe in water,—then shall the priest bring near the whole､ and make a perfume at the altar, an ascending-sacrifice it is､ an altar-flame of a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 13 But the inwards and the legs shall he bathe in water,—then shall the priest bring near the whole､ and make a perfume at the altar, an ascending-sacrifice it is､ an altar-flame of a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.

content: 14 But if of birds be the ascending-sacrifice of his oblation unto Yahweh then shall he bring near､ of the turtle-doves or of the young pigeons､ his oblation.
content_old: 14 But if of birds be the ascending-sacrifice of his oblation unto Yahweh then shall he bring near､ of the turtle-doves or of the young pigeons､ his oblation.

content: 15 And the priest shall bring it near unto the altar, shall nip off its head､ and make a perfume at the altar,—and its blood shall be drained out upon the wall of the altar.
content_old: 15 And the priest shall bring it near unto the altar, shall nip off its head､ and make a perfume at the altar,—and its blood shall be drained out upon the wall of the altar.

content: 16 Then shall he take away its crop with its plumage,—and cast it beside the altar､ eastward, into the place of fat ashes;
content_old: 16 Then shall he take away its crop with its plumage,—and cast it beside the altar､ eastward, into the place of fat ashes;

content: 1 But when any person would bring near as an oblation､ a meal-offering､ unto Yahweh of fine meal shall be his oblation,—and he shall pour out thereon､ oil, and place thereon､ frankincense;
content_old: 1 But when any person would bring near as an oblation､ a meal-offering､ unto Yahweh of fine meal shall be his oblation,—and he shall pour out thereon､ oil, and place thereon､ frankincense;

content: 2 so shall he bring it in unto the sons of Aaron､ the priests, and he shall grasp therefrom a handful of the fine meal thereof and of the oil thereof, besides all the frankincense thereof,—and the priest shall make a perfume with the memorial thereof､ at the altar, an altar-flame of a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 2 so shall he bring it in unto the sons of Aaron､ the priests, and he shall grasp therefrom a handful of the fine meal thereof and of the oil thereof, besides all the frankincense thereof,—and the priest shall make a perfume with the memorial thereof､ at the altar, an altar-flame of a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.

content: 3 But the remainder of the meal-offering pertaineth unto Aaron､ and unto his sons,—most holy､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh.
content_old: 3 But the remainder of the meal-offering pertaineth unto Aaron､ and unto his sons,—most holy､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh.

content: 4 Moreover when thou wouldst bring near､ as an oblation of a meal-offering､ something baked in an oven round､ unleavened cakes of fine meal､ overflowed with oil shall it be, or unleavened wafers anointed with oil.
content_old: 4 Moreover when thou wouldst bring near､ as an oblation of a meal-offering､ something baked in an oven round､ unleavened cakes of fine meal､ overflowed with oil shall it be, or unleavened wafers anointed with oil.

content: 5 But if a meal-offering on a girdle be thine oblation of fine meal､ overflowed with oil､ unleavened shall it be;
content_old: 5 But if a meal-offering on a girdle be thine oblation of fine meal､ overflowed with oil､ unleavened shall it be;

content: 6 parting it into pieces then shalt thou pour thereon､ oil,—a meal-offering it is.
content_old: 6 parting it into pieces then shalt thou pour thereon､ oil,—a meal-offering it is.

content: 7 But if a meal-offering of the boiler be thine oblation of fine meal､ with oil shall it be made.
content_old: 7 But if a meal-offering of the boiler be thine oblation of fine meal､ with oil shall it be made.

content: 8 Then shalt thou bring in the meal-offering that is made of these､ unto Yahweh,—and one shall bring it near､ unto the priest, and he shall take it near､ unto the altar.
content_old: 8 Then shalt thou bring in the meal-offering that is made of these､ unto Yahweh,—and one shall bring it near､ unto the priest, and he shall take it near､ unto the altar.

content: 9 Then shall the priest uplift､ out of the meal-offering､ a memorial thereof, and make a perfume at the altar,—an altar-flame of a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 9 Then shall the priest uplift､ out of the meal-offering､ a memorial thereof, and make a perfume at the altar,—an altar-flame of a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.

content: 10 But the remainder of the meal-offering pertaineth to Aaron and to his sons,—most holy､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh.
content_old: 10 But the remainder of the meal-offering pertaineth to Aaron and to his sons,—most holy､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh.

content: 11 None of the meal-offerings which ye bring near unto Yahweh shall be made into anything leavened,—for of no leaven､ and of no syrup may ye make a perfume, as an altar-flame unto Yahweh.
content_old: 11 None of the meal-offerings which ye bring near unto Yahweh shall be made into anything leavened,—for of no leaven､ and of no syrup may ye make a perfume, as an altar-flame unto Yahweh.

content: 12 As for an oblation of first-fruits ye shall bring them near��� unto Yahweh,—but unto the altar they shall not take them up､ as a satisfying odour.
content_old: 12 As for an oblation of first-fruits ye shall bring them near��� unto Yahweh,—but unto the altar they shall not take them up､ as a satisfying odour.

content: 13 And every meal-offering oblation of thine with salt shalt thou season, and thou shalt not suffer to be lacking the salt of the covenant of thy God, from upon thy meal-offering,—upon every oblation of thine shalt thou offer salt.
content_old: 13 And every meal-offering oblation of thine with salt shalt thou season, and thou shalt not suffer to be lacking the salt of the covenant of thy God, from upon thy meal-offering,—upon every oblation of thine shalt thou offer salt.

content: 14 But if thou wouldst bring near a meal-offering of first-ripe corn､ unto Yahweh of green ears､ roasted in fire､ crushed grain of garden-land shalt thou bring near thy meal-offering of first-ripe corn.
content_old: 14 But if thou wouldst bring near a meal-offering of first-ripe corn､ unto Yahweh of green ears､ roasted in fire､ crushed grain of garden-land shalt thou bring near thy meal-offering of first-ripe corn.

content: 15 And thou shalt place thereon､ oil, and shalt put thereon､ frankincense,—a meal-offering it is.
content_old: 15 And thou shalt place thereon､ oil, and shalt put thereon､ frankincense,—a meal-offering it is.

content: 1 But if a peace-offering be his oblation if of the herd he himself be bringing near,—whether male or female without defect shall he bring it near､ before Yahweh.
content_old: 1 But if a peace-offering be his oblation if of the herd he himself be bringing near,—whether male or female without defect shall he bring it near､ before Yahweh.

content: 2 Then shall he lean his hand upon the head of his oblation, and slay it at the entrance of the tent of meeting,—and the sons of Aaron､ the priests､ shall dash the blood against the altar､ round about.
content_old: 2 Then shall he lean his hand upon the head of his oblation, and slay it at the entrance of the tent of meeting,—and the sons of Aaron､ the priests､ shall dash the blood against the altar､ round about.

content: 3 Then shall he bring near､out of the peace-offering, an altar-flame unto Yahweh,—the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards;
content_old: 3 Then shall he bring near､out of the peace-offering, an altar-flame unto Yahweh,—the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards;

content: 4 and the two kidneys, and the fat which is upon them､ which is upon the loins,—and the caul upon the liver, upon the kidneys shall he remove it.
content_old: 4 and the two kidneys, and the fat which is upon them､ which is upon the loins,—and the caul upon the liver, upon the kidneys shall he remove it.

content: 5 Then shall the sons of Aaron make thereof a perfume､ at the altar, upon the ascending-sacrifice､ which is on the wood､ which is on the fire,—an altar-flame of a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 5 Then shall the sons of Aaron make thereof a perfume､ at the altar, upon the ascending-sacrifice､ which is on the wood､ which is on the fire,—an altar-flame of a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.

content: 6 But if out of the flock be his oblation､ for a peace-offering unto Yahweh whether male or female—without defect shall he bring it near.
content_old: 6 But if out of the flock be his oblation､ for a peace-offering unto Yahweh whether male or female—without defect shall he bring it near.

content: 7 If a young sheep he himself be bringing near as his oblation then shall he bring it near､ before Yahweh.
content_old: 7 If a young sheep he himself be bringing near as his oblation then shall he bring it near､ before Yahweh.

content: 8 And he shall lean his hand upon the head of his oblation, and shall slay it､ before the tent of meeting,—and the sons of Aaron shall dash the blood thereof against the altar､ round about.
content_old: 8 And he shall lean his hand upon the head of his oblation, and shall slay it､ before the tent of meeting,—and the sons of Aaron shall dash the blood thereof against the altar､ round about.

content: 9 Then shall he bring near､ out of the peace-offering､ an altar-flame unto Yahweh, the fat thereof､ the fat-tail thereof entire close to the backbone shall he remove it,—and the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards;
content_old: 9 Then shall he bring near､ out of the peace-offering､ an altar-flame unto Yahweh, the fat thereof､ the fat-tail thereof entire close to the backbone shall he remove it,—and the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards;

content: 10 and the two kidneys, with the fat that is on them､ which is on the loins,—and the caul that is on the liver, on the kidneys shall he remove it.
content_old: 10 and the two kidneys, with the fat that is on them､ which is on the loins,—and the caul that is on the liver, on the kidneys shall he remove it.

content: 11 Then shall the priest make a perfume､ at the altar,—the food of an altar-flame､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 11 Then shall the priest make a perfume､ at the altar,—the food of an altar-flame､ unto Yahweh.

content: 12 But if a goat be his oblation then shall he bring it near､ before Yahweh.
content_old: 12 But if a goat be his oblation then shall he bring it near､ before Yahweh.

content: 13 And he shall lean his hand upon its head, and shall slay it､ before the tent of meeting,—and the sons of Aaron shall dash its blood against the altar､ round about.
content_old: 13 And he shall lean his hand upon its head, and shall slay it､ before the tent of meeting,—and the sons of Aaron shall dash its blood against the altar､ round about.

content: 14 Then shall he bring near therefrom､ as his oblation､ an altar-flame unto Yahweh,—the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards;
content_old: 14 Then shall he bring near therefrom､ as his oblation､ an altar-flame unto Yahweh,—the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards;

content: 15 and the two kidneys, and the fat that is on them､ which is on the loins,—the caul upon the liver, on the kidneys shall he remove it.
content_old: 15 and the two kidneys, and the fat that is on them､ which is on the loins,—the caul upon the liver, on the kidneys shall he remove it.

content: 16 Then shall the priest make a perfume at the altar,—the food of an altar-flame､ for a satisfying odour,—all the fat—unto Yahweh.
content_old: 16 Then shall the priest make a perfume at the altar,—the food of an altar-flame､ for a satisfying odour,—all the fat—unto Yahweh.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake､ unto Moses saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake､ unto Moses saying:

content: 2 Speak thou unto the sons of Israel､ saying— When any person shall sin by mistake､ departing from any of the commandments of Yahweh, as to things which should not be done, and shall do any one of them—
content_old: 2 Speak thou unto the sons of Israel､ saying— When any person shall sin by mistake､ departing from any of the commandments of Yahweh, as to things which should not be done, and shall do any one of them—

content: 3 If the anointed priest shall sin､ so as to bring guilt upon the people then shall he bring near､ for his sin which he hath committed､ a choice young bullock without defect､ unto Yahweh､ as a sin-bearer.
content_old: 3 If the anointed priest shall sin､ so as to bring guilt upon the people then shall he bring near､ for his sin which he hath committed､ a choice young bullock without defect､ unto Yahweh､ as a sin-bearer.

content: 4 And he shall bring in the bullock unto the entrance of the tent of meeting､ before Yahweh,—and shall lean his hand､ upon the head of the bullock､ and shall slay the bullock､ before Yahweh.
content_old: 4 And he shall bring in the bullock unto the entrance of the tent of meeting､ before Yahweh,—and shall lean his hand､ upon the head of the bullock､ and shall slay the bullock､ before Yahweh.

content: 5 And the anointed priest shall take of the blood of the bullock,—and bring it into the tent of meeting;
content_old: 5 And the anointed priest shall take of the blood of the bullock,—and bring it into the tent of meeting;

content: 6 and the priest shall dip his finger in the blood,—and sprinkle of the blood seven times､ before Yahweh, in front of the veil of the sanctuary.
content_old: 6 and the priest shall dip his finger in the blood,—and sprinkle of the blood seven times､ before Yahweh, in front of the veil of the sanctuary.

content: 7 Then shall the priest put of the blood upon the horns of the altar of fragrant incense､ before Yahweh, which is in the tent of meeting,—and all the remainder of the blood of the bullock shall he pour out at the base of the altar of ascending-sacrifice, which is at the entrance of the tent of meeting.
content_old: 7 Then shall the priest put of the blood upon the horns of the altar of fragrant incense､ before Yahweh, which is in the tent of meeting,—and all the remainder of the blood of the bullock shall he pour out at the base of the altar of ascending-sacrifice, which is at the entrance of the tent of meeting.

content: 8 And all the fat of the sin-bearing bullock shall he heave up therefrom,—the fat that covereth over the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards;
content_old: 8 And all the fat of the sin-bearing bullock shall he heave up therefrom,—the fat that covereth over the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards;

content: 9 and the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them､ which is upon the loins,—and as for the caul upon the liver upon the kidneys shall he remove it:
content_old: 9 and the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them､ which is upon the loins,—and as for the caul upon the liver upon the kidneys shall he remove it:

content: 10 just as it is heaved up from the ox of the peace-offering,—and the priest shall make of them a perfume on the altar of ascending-sacrifice.
content_old: 10 just as it is heaved up from the ox of the peace-offering,—and the priest shall make of them a perfume on the altar of ascending-sacrifice.

content: 11 But as for the skin of the bullock､ and all its flesh､ with its head and with its legs,—and its inwards､ and its dung
content_old: 11 But as for the skin of the bullock､ and all its flesh､ with its head and with its legs,—and its inwards､ and its dung

content: 12 he shall take forth the entire bullock—unto the outside of the camp､ unto a clean place､ unto the outpoured heap of fat-ashes, and shall burn it up on wood､ in the fire,—upon the outpoured heap of fat-ashes shall it be burned up.
content_old: 12 he shall take forth the entire bullock—unto the outside of the camp､ unto a clean place､ unto the outpoured heap of fat-ashes, and shall burn it up on wood､ in the fire,—upon the outpoured heap of fat-ashes shall it be burned up.

content: 13 And if the whole assembly of Israel shall make a mistake, and a matter be hidden from the eyes of the convocation,—and so they do something､ whereby they depart from any of the commandments of Yahweh､ as to things which should not be done､ and become guilty;
content_old: 13 And if the whole assembly of Israel shall make a mistake, and a matter be hidden from the eyes of the convocation,—and so they do something､ whereby they depart from any of the commandments of Yahweh､ as to things which should not be done､ and become guilty;

content: 14 and the sin shall become known､ which they have committed therein then shall the convocation bring near a choice young bullock､ as a sin-bearer, yea they shall bring it in､ before the tent of meeting;
content_old: 14 and the sin shall become known､ which they have committed therein then shall the convocation bring near a choice young bullock､ as a sin-bearer, yea they shall bring it in､ before the tent of meeting;

content: 15 and the elders of the assembly shall lean their hands upon the head of the bullock､ before Yahweh,—and shall slay the bullock､ before Yahweh;
content_old: 15 and the elders of the assembly shall lean their hands upon the head of the bullock､ before Yahweh,—and shall slay the bullock､ before Yahweh;

content: 16 and the anointed priest shall bring in of the blood of the bullock,—into the tent of meeting;
content_old: 16 and the anointed priest shall bring in of the blood of the bullock,—into the tent of meeting;

content: 17 and the priest shall dip his finger in the blood,—and shall sprinkle of the blood seven times､ before Yahweh, upon the face of the veil;
content_old: 17 and the priest shall dip his finger in the blood,—and shall sprinkle of the blood seven times､ before Yahweh, upon the face of the veil;

content: 18 and some of the blood shall he put upon the horns of the altar which is before Yahweh, which is in the tent of meeting; and all the remainder of the blood shall he pour out at the base of the altar of ascending-sacrifice, which is at the entrance of the tent of meeting;
content_old: 18 and some of the blood shall he put upon the horns of the altar which is before Yahweh, which is in the tent of meeting; and all the remainder of the blood shall he pour out at the base of the altar of ascending-sacrifice, which is at the entrance of the tent of meeting;

content: 19 and as for all the fat thereof he shall heave up therefrom,—and make a perfume at the altar.
content_old: 19 and as for all the fat thereof he shall heave up therefrom,—and make a perfume at the altar.

content: 20 And he shall do to the bullock, as he did to the first sin-bearing bullock so shall he do with this,—and the priest shall put a propitiatory-covering over them and it shall be forgiven them.
content_old: 20 And he shall do to the bullock, as he did to the first sin-bearing bullock so shall he do with this,—and the priest shall put a propitiatory-covering over them and it shall be forgiven them.

content: 21 And he shall take forth the bullock unto the outside of the camp, and burn it up､ just as he burned up the first bullock,—the sin-bearer of the convocation it is.
content_old: 21 And he shall take forth the bullock unto the outside of the camp, and burn it up､ just as he burned up the first bullock,—the sin-bearer of the convocation it is.

content: 22 When a prince shall sin,—and shall do something､ departing from any of the commandments of Yahweh his God､ as to things which should not be done､by mistake and shall become aware of his guilt;
content_old: 22 When a prince shall sin,—and shall do something､ departing from any of the commandments of Yahweh his God､ as to things which should not be done､by mistake and shall become aware of his guilt;

content: 23 or his sin wherein he hath sinned be made known unto him then shall he bring in､ as his oblation､ a he—goat､ a male without defect;
content_old: 23 or his sin wherein he hath sinned be made known unto him then shall he bring in､ as his oblation､ a he—goat､ a male without defect;

content: 24 and shall lean his hand upon the head of the goat, and shall slay it in the place where they slay the ascending-sacrifice before Yahweh,—a sin-bearer it is.
content_old: 24 and shall lean his hand upon the head of the goat, and shall slay it in the place where they slay the ascending-sacrifice before Yahweh,—a sin-bearer it is.

content: 25 And the priest shall take of the blood of the sin-bearer with his finger, and put upon the horns of the altar of ascending-sacrifice; and the remainder of the blood thereof shall he pour out at the base of the altar of ascending-sacrifice;
content_old: 25 And the priest shall take of the blood of the sin-bearer with his finger, and put upon the horns of the altar of ascending-sacrifice; and the remainder of the blood thereof shall he pour out at the base of the altar of ascending-sacrifice;

content: 26 and with all the fat thereof shall he make a perfume at the altar, as with the fat of the peace-offering,—so shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him､ because of his sin､ and it shall be forgiven him.
content_old: 26 and with all the fat thereof shall he make a perfume at the altar, as with the fat of the peace-offering,—so shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him､ because of his sin､ and it shall be forgiven him.

content: 27 And if any person shall sin by mistake from among the people of the land,—by his doing anything departing from any of the commandments of Yahweh､ as to things which should not be done､ and shall become aware of his guilt;
content_old: 27 And if any person shall sin by mistake from among the people of the land,—by his doing anything departing from any of the commandments of Yahweh､ as to things which should not be done､ and shall become aware of his guilt;

content: 28 or his sin which he hath committed shall be made known unto him then shall he bring in､ as his oblation､ a kid of the goats､ a female without defect､ for his sin which he hath committed;
content_old: 28 or his sin which he hath committed shall be made known unto him then shall he bring in､ as his oblation､ a kid of the goats､ a female without defect､ for his sin which he hath committed;

content: 29 and shall lean his hand upon the head of the sin-bearer,—and shall slay the sin-bearer､ in the place of the ascending-sacrifice.
content_old: 29 and shall lean his hand upon the head of the sin-bearer,—and shall slay the sin-bearer､ in the place of the ascending-sacrifice.

content: 30 Then shall the priest take of the blood thereof with his finger, and put upon the horns of the altar of ascending-sacrifice,—and all the remaining blood thereof shall he pour out､ at the base of the altar;
content_old: 30 Then shall the priest take of the blood thereof with his finger, and put upon the horns of the altar of ascending-sacrifice,—and all the remaining blood thereof shall he pour out､ at the base of the altar;

content: 31 and all the fat thereof shall he remove as the fat from off the peace-offering was removed, and the priest shall make a perfume at the altar, for a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh,—so shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him､ and it shall be forgiven him.
content_old: 31 and all the fat thereof shall he remove as the fat from off the peace-offering was removed, and the priest shall make a perfume at the altar, for a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh,—so shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him､ and it shall be forgiven him.

content: 32 And if a lamb he bring in､ as his oblation､ for a sin-bearer a female without defect shall he bring in;
content_old: 32 And if a lamb he bring in､ as his oblation､ for a sin-bearer a female without defect shall he bring in;

content: 33 and shall lean his hand､ upon the head of the sin-bearer,—and shall slay it as a sin-bearer, in the place where they slay the ascending-sacrifice.
content_old: 33 and shall lean his hand､ upon the head of the sin-bearer,—and shall slay it as a sin-bearer, in the place where they slay the ascending-sacrifice.

content: 34 Then shall the priest take of the blood of the sin-bearer､ with his finger, and put upon the horns of the altar of ascending-sacrifice,—and all the remaining blood thereof shall he pour out, at the base of the altar;
content_old: 34 Then shall the priest take of the blood of the sin-bearer､ with his finger, and put upon the horns of the altar of ascending-sacrifice,—and all the remaining blood thereof shall he pour out, at the base of the altar;

content: 1 Any person, moreover, whensoever he shall sin､ in that､ when he heareth a voice of swearing, he himself being a witness､ either seeing or knowing,—if he do not tell､ and so hath to bear his iniquity:—
content_old: 1 Any person, moreover, whensoever he shall sin､ in that､ when he heareth a voice of swearing, he himself being a witness､ either seeing or knowing,—if he do not tell､ and so hath to bear his iniquity:—

content: 2 Or any person who toucheth anything unclean, whether the carcase of an unclean wild-beast､ or the carcase of an unclean tame-beast, or the carcase of an unclean creeping thing,—and it is hidden from him, he himself being unclean､ and he becometh aware of his, guilt:—
content_old: 2 Or any person who toucheth anything unclean, whether the carcase of an unclean wild-beast､ or the carcase of an unclean tame-beast, or the carcase of an unclean creeping thing,—and it is hidden from him, he himself being unclean､ and he becometh aware of his, guilt:—

content: 3 Or whensoever one shall touch the uncleanness of man, as regardeth any uncleanness of his､ wherewith one may become unclean,—and it be hidden from him, and then he himself getting to know it､ becometh aware of his guilt:—
content_old: 3 Or whensoever one shall touch the uncleanness of man, as regardeth any uncleanness of his､ wherewith one may become unclean,—and it be hidden from him, and then he himself getting to know it､ becometh aware of his guilt:—

content: 4 Or any person whensoever he shall swear､ speaking unadvisedly with the lips､ to harm or to help､ as regardeth anything wherein the son of earth may speak unadvisedly by way of oath､ and it be hidden from him,—and then he himself getting to know it, becometh aware of his guilt､ as regardeth any one of these things.
content_old: 4 Or any person whensoever he shall swear､ speaking unadvisedly with the lips､ to harm or to help､ as regardeth anything wherein the son of earth may speak unadvisedly by way of oath､ and it be hidden from him,—and then he himself getting to know it, becometh aware of his guilt､ as regardeth any one of these things.

content: 5 Then shall it be, when he becometh aware of his guilt､ as regardeth any one of these things that he shall confess that wherein he hath sinned;
content_old: 5 Then shall it be, when he becometh aware of his guilt､ as regardeth any one of these things that he shall confess that wherein he hath sinned;

content: 6 and shall bring in as his guilt-bearer unto Yahweh､ for his sin which he hath committed､ a female from the flock—a lamb or a kid of the goats—as a sin-bearer,—so shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him､ because of his sin.
content_old: 6 and shall bring in as his guilt-bearer unto Yahweh､ for his sin which he hath committed､ a female from the flock—a lamb or a kid of the goats—as a sin-bearer,—so shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him､ because of his sin.

content: 7 And if his hand cannot reach sufficient for a lamb then shall he bring in to bear his guilt—for that he hath sinned—two turtle-doves､ or two young pigeons､ unto Yahweh,—one for a sin-bearer､ and one for an ascending-sacrifice.
content_old: 7 And if his hand cannot reach sufficient for a lamb then shall he bring in to bear his guilt—for that he hath sinned—two turtle-doves､ or two young pigeons､ unto Yahweh,—one for a sin-bearer､ and one for an ascending-sacrifice.

content: 8 And he shall take them in unto the priest, who shall bring near that which is for a sin-bearer､ first,—and shall nip through the neck close to the head､ but shall not divide it asunder.
content_old: 8 And he shall take them in unto the priest, who shall bring near that which is for a sin-bearer､ first,—and shall nip through the neck close to the head､ but shall not divide it asunder.

content: 9 And he shall sprinkle of the blood of the sin-bearer upon the wall of the altar, and the remainder of the blood shall he drain out､ at the base of the altar,—a sin-bearer it is.
content_old: 9 And he shall sprinkle of the blood of the sin-bearer upon the wall of the altar, and the remainder of the blood shall he drain out､ at the base of the altar,—a sin-bearer it is.

content: 10 And of the second shall he make an ascending-sacrifice､ according to the regulation,—so shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him､ because of his sin which he hath committed､ and it shall be forgiven him.
content_old: 10 And of the second shall he make an ascending-sacrifice､ according to the regulation,—so shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him､ because of his sin which he hath committed､ and it shall be forgiven him.

content: 11 But if his hand cannot lay hold of two turtle-doves､ or two young pigeons then shall he bring in as his oblation—because he hath sinned—the tenth of an ephah of fine meal､ for bearing sin,—he shall not put thereon oil､ neither shall he lay thereon frankincense, for a sin-bearer it is.
content_old: 11 But if his hand cannot lay hold of two turtle-doves､ or two young pigeons then shall he bring in as his oblation—because he hath sinned—the tenth of an ephah of fine meal､ for bearing sin,—he shall not put thereon oil､ neither shall he lay thereon frankincense, for a sin-bearer it is.

content: 12 And he shall bring it in unto the priest, and the priest shall take therefrom a handful､ as the memorial thereof, and shall make a perfume at the altar, upon the altar-flames of Yahweh,—a sin-bearer it is.
content_old: 12 And he shall bring it in unto the priest, and the priest shall take therefrom a handful､ as the memorial thereof, and shall make a perfume at the altar, upon the altar-flames of Yahweh,—a sin-bearer it is.

content: 13 So shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him, on account of his sin which he hath committed､ departing from some one of these things､ and it shall be forgiven him,—then shall it be the priest’s, like the meal-offering.
content_old: 13 So shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him, on account of his sin which he hath committed､ departing from some one of these things､ and it shall be forgiven him,—then shall it be the priest’s, like the meal-offering.

content: 14 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—
content_old: 14 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—

content: 15 Whensoever any person shall commit a trespass, and shall take away by mistake､ from the holy things of Yahweh then shall he bring in as his guilt-bearer unto Yahweh､ a ram without defect out of the flock､ with thine estimate in silver by shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary､ for a guilt-bearer:
content_old: 15 Whensoever any person shall commit a trespass, and shall take away by mistake､ from the holy things of Yahweh then shall he bring in as his guilt-bearer unto Yahweh､ a ram without defect out of the flock､ with thine estimate in silver by shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary､ for a guilt-bearer:

content: 16 that､ moreover､ which he took away from the sanctuary shall he make good､ and the fifth part thereof shall he add thereunto, and shall give it to the priest,—and the priest shall put a propitiatory-covering over him with the guilt-bearing ram､ and it shall be forgiven him.
content_old: 16 that､ moreover､ which he took away from the sanctuary shall he make good､ and the fifth part thereof shall he add thereunto, and shall give it to the priest,—and the priest shall put a propitiatory-covering over him with the guilt-bearing ram､ and it shall be forgiven him.

content: 17 And if any person when he shall sin, and do something､ departing from any of the commandments of Yahweh, as to things which should not be done,—though he knew it not, shall so become guilty､ and shall bear his iniquity
content_old: 17 And if any person when he shall sin, and do something､ departing from any of the commandments of Yahweh, as to things which should not be done,—though he knew it not, shall so become guilty､ and shall bear his iniquity

content: 18 then shall he bring in a ram without defect out of the flock､ by thine estimate as a guilt-bearer､ unto the priest,—and the priest shall put a propitiatory-covering over him､ on account of his mistake which he made､ though he knew it not､ and it shall be forgiven him:
content_old: 18 then shall he bring in a ram without defect out of the flock､ by thine estimate as a guilt-bearer､ unto the priest,—and the priest shall put a propitiatory-covering over him､ on account of his mistake which he made､ though he knew it not､ and it shall be forgiven him:

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—

content: 2 When any person shall sin, and shall commit a trespass against Yahweh,—and shall withhold something of the truth from his neighbour､ in respect of a deposit, or a pledge or anything plundered, or shall use extortion with his neighbour;
content_old: 2 When any person shall sin, and shall commit a trespass against Yahweh,—and shall withhold something of the truth from his neighbour､ in respect of a deposit, or a pledge or anything plundered, or shall use extortion with his neighbour;

content: 3 or shall find something lost and shall withhold something of the truth therein､ and shall swear to a falsehood,—as regardeth a single thing of all that a son of earth may do, to commit sin thereby;
content_old: 3 or shall find something lost and shall withhold something of the truth therein､ and shall swear to a falsehood,—as regardeth a single thing of all that a son of earth may do, to commit sin thereby;

content: 4 and so it shall come about that he shall commit sin and then become aware of his guilt then shall he return the plunder which he had plundered､ or the extortion which he had extorted, or the deposit that was deposited with him,—or the lost thing which he hath found:
content_old: 4 and so it shall come about that he shall commit sin and then become aware of his guilt then shall he return the plunder which he had plundered､ or the extortion which he had extorted, or the deposit that was deposited with him,—or the lost thing which he hath found:

content: 5 or in anything as to which he hath been swearing to a falsehood then shall he make it good in the principal thereof, and the fifth part thereof shall he add thereunto,—to whomsoever it belongeth to him shall he give it､ in the day he becometh aware of his guilt;
content_old: 5 or in anything as to which he hath been swearing to a falsehood then shall he make it good in the principal thereof, and the fifth part thereof shall he add thereunto,—to whomsoever it belongeth to him shall he give it､ in the day he becometh aware of his guilt;

content: 6 but his guilt-bearer itself shall he bring in unto Yahweh,—a ram without defect､ out of the flock､ by thine estimate as a guilt-bearer､ unto the priest.
content_old: 6 but his guilt-bearer itself shall he bring in unto Yahweh,—a ram without defect､ out of the flock､ by thine estimate as a guilt-bearer､ unto the priest.

content: 7 So shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him before Yahweh､ and it shall be forgiven him,—on account of any one thing､ of all which one might do､ so as to become guilty therein.
content_old: 7 So shall the priest put a propitiatory-covering over him before Yahweh､ and it shall be forgiven him,—on account of any one thing､ of all which one might do､ so as to become guilty therein.

content: 8 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 8 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 9 Command Aaron and his sons､ saying, This is the law of the ascending-sacrifice,— the same is the ascending-sacrifice､ which is upon the hearth､ upon the altar､ all the night until the morning,—and the fire of the altar shall be kept burning therein.
content_old: 9 Command Aaron and his sons､ saying, This is the law of the ascending-sacrifice,— the same is the ascending-sacrifice､ which is upon the hearth､ upon the altar､ all the night until the morning,—and the fire of the altar shall be kept burning therein.

content: 10 So then the priest shall put on his upper garment of linen､ and breeches of linen shall he put on over his flesh, then shall he take up the fat-ashes､ whereto the fire consumeth the ascending-sacrifice on the altar,—and shall put them beside the altar.
content_old: 10 So then the priest shall put on his upper garment of linen､ and breeches of linen shall he put on over his flesh, then shall he take up the fat-ashes､ whereto the fire consumeth the ascending-sacrifice on the altar,—and shall put them beside the altar.

content: 11 Then shall he put off his garments, and put on other garments,—and shall carry forth the fat-ashes､ unto the outside of the camp, unto a clean place.
content_old: 11 Then shall he put off his garments, and put on other garments,—and shall carry forth the fat-ashes､ unto the outside of the camp, unto a clean place.

content: 12 And the fire on the altar shall be kept burning therein､ it shall not be suffered to go out, but the priest shall kindle up thereon pieces of wood､ morning by morning,—and shall set in order thereupon the ascending-sacrifice, and shall make a perfume thereon､ with the fat-pieces of the peace-offerings:
content_old: 12 And the fire on the altar shall be kept burning therein､ it shall not be suffered to go out, but the priest shall kindle up thereon pieces of wood､ morning by morning,—and shall set in order thereupon the ascending-sacrifice, and shall make a perfume thereon､ with the fat-pieces of the peace-offerings:

content: 13 fire shall continually be kept burning on the altar､ it shall not be suffered to go out.
content_old: 13 fire shall continually be kept burning on the altar､ it shall not be suffered to go out.

content: 14 And this is the law of the meal-offering,—the sons of Aaron shall bring it near before Yahweh, unto the front of the altar.
content_old: 14 And this is the law of the meal-offering,—the sons of Aaron shall bring it near before Yahweh, unto the front of the altar.

content: 15 Then shall one lift up therefrom a handful of the fine meal of the meal-offering, and of the oil thereof, and all the frankincense which is upon the meal-offering,—and shall make a perfume at the altar､an altar-flame of a satisfying odour shall the memorial thereof be､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 15 Then shall one lift up therefrom a handful of the fine meal of the meal-offering, and of the oil thereof, and all the frankincense which is upon the meal-offering,—and shall make a perfume at the altar､an altar-flame of a satisfying odour shall the memorial thereof be､ unto Yahweh.

content: 16 And the remainder thereof shall Aaron and his sons eat,—as unleavened cakes shall it be eaten､ in a holy place, within the court of the tent of meeting shall they eat it.
content_old: 16 And the remainder thereof shall Aaron and his sons eat,—as unleavened cakes shall it be eaten､ in a holy place, within the court of the tent of meeting shall they eat it.

content: 17 It shall not be baked into anything leavened, as their portion have I given it､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh,—most holy it is, like the sin-bearer､ and like the guilt-bearer.
content_old: 17 It shall not be baked into anything leavened, as their portion have I given it､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh,—most holy it is, like the sin-bearer､ and like the guilt-bearer.

content: 18 Any male among the sons of Aaron may eat it, an age-abiding statute to your generations､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh,—every one that toucheth them shall be hallowed.
content_old: 18 Any male among the sons of Aaron may eat it, an age-abiding statute to your generations､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh,—every one that toucheth them shall be hallowed.

content: 19 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—
content_old: 19 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—

content: 20 This is the oblation of Aaron and his sons､ which they shall bring near unto Yahweh in the day when he is anointed, The tenth of an ephah of fine meal､ as a continual meal-offering,—half thereof in the morning+, and half thereof in the evening;
content_old: 20 This is the oblation of Aaron and his sons､ which they shall bring near unto Yahweh in the day when he is anointed, The tenth of an ephah of fine meal､ as a continual meal-offering,—half thereof in the morning+, and half thereof in the evening;

content: 21 on a pan､ with oil shall it be made､ when well mingled shalt thou bring it in,—in baked portions､ as a meal-offering in pieces shalt thou bring it near､ as a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 21 on a pan､ with oil shall it be made､ when well mingled shalt thou bring it in,—in baked portions､ as a meal-offering in pieces shalt thou bring it near､ as a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh.

content: 22 And the priest that is anointed in his stead from among his sons shall prepare it,—it is an age-abiding statute, that unto Yahweh shall a perfume of the entire gift be made:
content_old: 22 And the priest that is anointed in his stead from among his sons shall prepare it,—it is an age-abiding statute, that unto Yahweh shall a perfume of the entire gift be made:

content: 23 yea every meal-offering of a priest shall be entire—it shall not be eaten.
content_old: 23 yea every meal-offering of a priest shall be entire—it shall not be eaten.

content: 24 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—
content_old: 24 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—

content: 25 Speak unto Aaron and unto his sons､ saying, This is the law of the sin-bearer. In the place where the ascending-sacrifice is slain shall the sin-bearer be slain､ before Yahweh, most hoIy it is.
content_old: 25 Speak unto Aaron and unto his sons､ saying, This is the law of the sin-bearer. In the place where the ascending-sacrifice is slain shall the sin-bearer be slain､ before Yahweh, most hoIy it is.

content: 26 The priest who maketh it a sin-bearer shall eat it,—in a holy place shall it be eaten, in the court of the tent of meeting.
content_old: 26 The priest who maketh it a sin-bearer shall eat it,—in a holy place shall it be eaten, in the court of the tent of meeting.

content: 27 Every one who toucheth the flesh thereof shall be hallowed; and when one sprinkleth some of the blood thereof upon a garment that whereon it was sprinkled shalt thou wash in a holy place.
content_old: 27 Every one who toucheth the flesh thereof shall be hallowed; and when one sprinkleth some of the blood thereof upon a garment that whereon it was sprinkled shalt thou wash in a holy place.

content: 28 But the earthen vessel wherein it is boiled shall be broken,—or if in a vessel of bronze it hath been boiled then shall the vessel be scoured and rinsed in water.
content_old: 28 But the earthen vessel wherein it is boiled shall be broken,—or if in a vessel of bronze it hath been boiled then shall the vessel be scoured and rinsed in water.

content: 29 Any male among the priests may eat thereof,—most holy it is.
content_old: 29 Any male among the priests may eat thereof,—most holy it is.

content: 1 And this is the law of the guilt-bearer,—most holy it is!
content_old: 1 And this is the law of the guilt-bearer,—most holy it is!

content: 2 In the place where they slay the ascending-sacrifice shall they slay the guilt-bearer; and the blood thereof shall one dash against the altar､ round about;
content_old: 2 In the place where they slay the ascending-sacrifice shall they slay the guilt-bearer; and the blood thereof shall one dash against the altar､ round about;

content: 3 and as for all the fat thereof one shall bring near therefrom,—the fat-tail, and the fat that covereth the inwards;
content_old: 3 and as for all the fat thereof one shall bring near therefrom,—the fat-tail, and the fat that covereth the inwards;

content: 4 and the two kidneys, with the fat that is upon them, which is upon the loins,—and the caul upon the liver, up to the kidneys shall he remove it.
content_old: 4 and the two kidneys, with the fat that is upon them, which is upon the loins,—and the caul upon the liver, up to the kidneys shall he remove it.

content: 5 And the priest shall make a perfume with them at the altar, an altar-flame unto Yahweh—a guilt-bearer it is.
content_old: 5 And the priest shall make a perfume with them at the altar, an altar-flame unto Yahweh—a guilt-bearer it is.

content: 6 Any male among the priests may eat thereof,—in a holy place shall it be eaten, most holy it is.
content_old: 6 Any male among the priests may eat thereof,—in a holy place shall it be eaten, most holy it is.

content: 7 As the sin-bearer so the guilt-bearer,—one law for them,—the priest who maketh a propitiatory-covering therewith—to him shall it belong.
content_old: 7 As the sin-bearer so the guilt-bearer,—one law for them,—the priest who maketh a propitiatory-covering therewith—to him shall it belong.

content: 8 And as for the priest who bringeth near the ascending-sacrifice of any man the skin of the ascending-sacrifice which he hath brought near to the priest himself shall it belong.
content_old: 8 And as for the priest who bringeth near the ascending-sacrifice of any man the skin of the ascending-sacrifice which he hath brought near to the priest himself shall it belong.

content: 9 And as for any meal-offering that may be baked in an oven, or anything that hath been prepared in a boiler or on a girddle to the priest that bringeth it near—to him shall it belong.
content_old: 9 And as for any meal-offering that may be baked in an oven, or anything that hath been prepared in a boiler or on a girddle to the priest that bringeth it near—to him shall it belong.

content: 10 And as for any meal-offering overflowed with oil､ or dry—to all the sons of Aaron shall it belong､ to one as much as to another.
content_old: 10 And as for any meal-offering overflowed with oil､ or dry—to all the sons of Aaron shall it belong､ to one as much as to another.

content: 11 And this is the law of the peace-offering which one may bring near unto Yahweh.
content_old: 11 And this is the law of the peace-offering which one may bring near unto Yahweh.

content: 12 If for thanksgiving he bring it near then shall he bring near､ with the thanksgiving sacrifice､ perforated cakes､ unleavened､ overflowed with oil, and wafers､ unleavened､ anointed with oil,—and of fine flour moistened, perforated cakes overflowed with oil.
content_old: 12 If for thanksgiving he bring it near then shall he bring near､ with the thanksgiving sacrifice､ perforated cakes､ unleavened､ overflowed with oil, and wafers､ unleavened､ anointed with oil,—and of fine flour moistened, perforated cakes overflowed with oil.

content: 13 With perforated cakes of leavened bread shall he bring near his oblation, with his peace-offering of thanksgiving.
content_old: 13 With perforated cakes of leavened bread shall he bring near his oblation, with his peace-offering of thanksgiving.

content: 14 Then shall he bring near､ therefrom､ one of each oblation, a heave-offering unto Yahweh,—to the priest who dasheth against the altar the blood of the peace-offering—to him shall it belong.
content_old: 14 Then shall he bring near､ therefrom､ one of each oblation, a heave-offering unto Yahweh,—to the priest who dasheth against the altar the blood of the peace-offering—to him shall it belong.

content: 15 But as for the flesh of his peace-offering of thanksgiving on the day of bringing it near shall it be eaten,—he shall not leave thereof､ until morning.
content_old: 15 But as for the flesh of his peace-offering of thanksgiving on the day of bringing it near shall it be eaten,—he shall not leave thereof､ until morning.

content: 16 But if a vow or a freewill offering be his sacrifice of oblation in the day he bringeth near his sacrifice shall it be eaten,—and on the morrow then may the remainder thereof be eaten;
content_old: 16 But if a vow or a freewill offering be his sacrifice of oblation in the day he bringeth near his sacrifice shall it be eaten,—and on the morrow then may the remainder thereof be eaten;

content: 17 but as for the remainder of the flesh of the sacrifice on the third day—in fire shall it be consumed.
content_old: 17 but as for the remainder of the flesh of the sacrifice on the third day—in fire shall it be consumed.

content: 18 And if any of the flesh of his peace-offering be at all eaten on the third day he that brought it near shall not be accepted it shall not be reckoned to him､ unclean shall it be,—and the person who shall eat thereof shall bear his iniquity.
content_old: 18 And if any of the flesh of his peace-offering be at all eaten on the third day he that brought it near shall not be accepted it shall not be reckoned to him､ unclean shall it be,—and the person who shall eat thereof shall bear his iniquity.

content: 19 And the flesh that toucheth anything unclean shall not be eaten, in fire shall it be consumed,—but as for the other flesh any one who is clean may eat flesh.
content_old: 19 And the flesh that toucheth anything unclean shall not be eaten, in fire shall it be consumed,—but as for the other flesh any one who is clean may eat flesh.

content: 20 But as for the person who shall eat flesh from the peace-offering､ which pertaineth unto Yahweh, while his uncleanness is on him then shall that person be cut off from among his kinsfolk. Yea､ as for any person
content_old: 20 But as for the person who shall eat flesh from the peace-offering､ which pertaineth unto Yahweh, while his uncleanness is on him then shall that person be cut off from among his kinsfolk. Yea､ as for any person

content: 21 whensoever he shall touch anything unclean—the uncleanness of man､ or an unclean beast､ or any unclean disgusting thing,—and then eateth of the flesh of a peace-offering that pertaineth unto Yahweh then shall that person be cut off from among his kinsfolk.
content_old: 21 whensoever he shall touch anything unclean—the uncleanness of man､ or an unclean beast､ or any unclean disgusting thing,—and then eateth of the flesh of a peace-offering that pertaineth unto Yahweh then shall that person be cut off from among his kinsfolk.

content: 22 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—
content_old: 22 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—

content: 23 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying,— No fat､ of ox or sheep or goat shall ye eat:
content_old: 23 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying,— No fat､ of ox or sheep or goat shall ye eat:

content: 24 and though the fat of what dieth of itself and the fat of that which has been torn in pieces may be used for any other service yet shall ye in nowise eat it.
content_old: 24 and though the fat of what dieth of itself and the fat of that which has been torn in pieces may be used for any other service yet shall ye in nowise eat it.

content: 25 Nay as touching any one who eateth the fat of any beast, wherefrom he might bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh then shall the person that eateth be cut off from among his kinsfolk.
content_old: 25 Nay as touching any one who eateth the fat of any beast, wherefrom he might bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh then shall the person that eateth be cut off from among his kinsfolk.

content: 26 And no manner of blood shall ye eat, in any of your dwellings,—whether of bird､ or of beast:
content_old: 26 And no manner of blood shall ye eat, in any of your dwellings,—whether of bird､ or of beast:

content: 27 as touching any person who eateth any manner of blood then shall that person be cut off from among his kinsfolk.
content_old: 27 as touching any person who eateth any manner of blood then shall that person be cut off from among his kinsfolk.

content: 28 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—
content_old: 28 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying—

content: 29 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying,— He that offereth his peace-offering unto Yahweh shall bring in his own oblation unto Yahweh､ out of his peace-offering:
content_old: 29 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying,— He that offereth his peace-offering unto Yahweh shall bring in his own oblation unto Yahweh､ out of his peace-offering:

content: 30 his own hands shall bring in the altar-flames of Yahweh,—the fat with the breast he shall bring it in, the breast to wave it as a wave-offering before Yahweh.
content_old: 30 his own hands shall bring in the altar-flames of Yahweh,—the fat with the breast he shall bring it in, the breast to wave it as a wave-offering before Yahweh.

content: 31 Then shall the priest make a perfume with the fat at the altar,—and the breast shall be for Aaron and for his sons.
content_old: 31 Then shall the priest make a perfume with the fat at the altar,—and the breast shall be for Aaron and for his sons.

content: 32 But the right shoulder shall ye give as a heave-offering､ unto the priest,—from among your peace-offerings
content_old: 32 But the right shoulder shall ye give as a heave-offering､ unto the priest,—from among your peace-offerings

content: 33 he that bringeth near the blood of the peace-offerings and the fat､ from among the sons of Aaron to him shall belong the right shoulder for a portion.
content_old: 33 he that bringeth near the blood of the peace-offerings and the fat､ from among the sons of Aaron to him shall belong the right shoulder for a portion.

content: 34 For the wave-breast､ and the heave-shoulder have I taken of the sons of Israel, out of their peace-offerings,—and have given them unto Aaron the priest､ and unto his sons､ as an age-abiding statute, from the sons of Israel.
content_old: 34 For the wave-breast､ and the heave-shoulder have I taken of the sons of Israel, out of their peace-offerings,—and have given them unto Aaron the priest､ and unto his sons､ as an age-abiding statute, from the sons of Israel.

content: 35 This is what pertaineth to the anointing of Aaron､ and to the anointing of his sons out of the altar-flames of Yahweh,—granted in the day when he brought them near, to minister as priests unto Yahweh:
content_old: 35 This is what pertaineth to the anointing of Aaron､ and to the anointing of his sons out of the altar-flames of Yahweh,—granted in the day when he brought them near, to minister as priests unto Yahweh:

content: 36 which Yahweh commanded to give them in the day when he anointed them, from among the sons of Israel,—an age-abiding statute､ to their generations.
content_old: 36 which Yahweh commanded to give them in the day when he anointed them, from among the sons of Israel,—an age-abiding statute､ to their generations.

content: 37 This is the law— for the ascending-sacrifice､ for the meal-offering, and for the sin-bearer､ and for the guilt-bearer,— and for the installation-offerings, and for the peace-offering:
content_old: 37 This is the law— for the ascending-sacrifice､ for the meal-offering, and for the sin-bearer､ and for the guilt-bearer,— and for the installation-offerings, and for the peace-offering:

content: 1 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Take thou Aaron､ and his sons with him, and the garments, and the anointing oil,—and the sin-bearing bullock, and the two rams, and the basket of unleavened cakes;
content_old: 2 Take thou Aaron､ and his sons with him, and the garments, and the anointing oil,—and the sin-bearing bullock, and the two rams, and the basket of unleavened cakes;

content: 3 and all the assembly call thou together,—unto the entrance of the tent of meeting.
content_old: 3 and all the assembly call thou together,—unto the entrance of the tent of meeting.

content: 4 And Moses did, as Yahweh commanded him,—and the assembly was called together, unto the entrance of the tent of meeting.
content_old: 4 And Moses did, as Yahweh commanded him,—and the assembly was called together, unto the entrance of the tent of meeting.

content: 5 Then said Moses unto the assembly,— This is the thing､ which Yahweh hath commanded to be done.
content_old: 5 Then said Moses unto the assembly,— This is the thing､ which Yahweh hath commanded to be done.

content: 6 So Moses brought near､ Aaron and his sons,—and bathed them with water,
content_old: 6 So Moses brought near､ Aaron and his sons,—and bathed them with water,

content: 7 and put upon him the tunic､ and girded him with the band, and clothed him with the robe, and put upon him the ephod, and girded him with the curiously-woven band of the ephod, and bound it to him therewith;
content_old: 7 and put upon him the tunic､ and girded him with the band, and clothed him with the robe, and put upon him the ephod, and girded him with the curiously-woven band of the ephod, and bound it to him therewith;

content: 8 and he put upon him the breastpiece,—and placed､ in the breastpiece､ the Lights and the Perfections;
content_old: 8 and he put upon him the breastpiece,—and placed､ in the breastpiece､ the Lights and the Perfections;

content: 9 and he put the turban upon his head,—and put upon the turban､ on the forefront thereof､ the burnished plate of gold—the holy crown, As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 9 and he put the turban upon his head,—and put upon the turban､ on the forefront thereof､ the burnished plate of gold—the holy crown, As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 10 And Moses took the anointing oil, and anointed the habitation､ and all that was therein,—and hallowed them;
content_old: 10 And Moses took the anointing oil, and anointed the habitation､ and all that was therein,—and hallowed them;

content: 11 and he sprinkled thereof upon the altar､ seven times,—and anointed the altar､ and all the utensils thereof､ and the laver and its stand､ to hallow them;
content_old: 11 and he sprinkled thereof upon the altar､ seven times,—and anointed the altar､ and all the utensils thereof､ and the laver and its stand､ to hallow them;

content: 12 and he poured of the anointing oil, upon the head of Aaron,—and anointed him､ to hallow him.
content_old: 12 and he poured of the anointing oil, upon the head of Aaron,—and anointed him､ to hallow him.

content: 13 And Moses brought near the sons of Aaron､ and clothed them with tunics､ and girded them with bands, and wrapped round for them turbans,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 13 And Moses brought near the sons of Aaron､ and clothed them with tunics､ and girded them with bands, and wrapped round for them turbans,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 14 Then was led near the sin-bearing bullock,—and Aaron and his sons leaned their hands upon the head of the sin-bearing bullock.
content_old: 14 Then was led near the sin-bearing bullock,—and Aaron and his sons leaned their hands upon the head of the sin-bearing bullock.

content: 15 Then was it slain､ and Moses took the blood､ and put thereof upon the horns of the altar round about､ with his finger, and cleansed the altar from sin,—and the remainder of the blood poured he forth at the base of the altar, and hallowed it､ putting a propitiatory-covering thereupon.
content_old: 15 Then was it slain､ and Moses took the blood､ and put thereof upon the horns of the altar round about､ with his finger, and cleansed the altar from sin,—and the remainder of the blood poured he forth at the base of the altar, and hallowed it､ putting a propitiatory-covering thereupon.

content: 16 And he took all the fat that was on the inwards, and the caul of the liver, and the two kidneys､ and their fat,—and Moses made a perfume at the altar.
content_old: 16 And he took all the fat that was on the inwards, and the caul of the liver, and the two kidneys､ and their fat,—and Moses made a perfume at the altar.

content: 17 But the bullock itself､ and its skin､ and its flesh and its dung consumed he with fire, outside the camp,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 17 But the bullock itself､ and its skin､ and its flesh and its dung consumed he with fire, outside the camp,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 18 Then was brought near the ram for the ascending-sacrifice,—and Aaron and his sons leaned their hands upon the head of the ram;
content_old: 18 Then was brought near the ram for the ascending-sacrifice,—and Aaron and his sons leaned their hands upon the head of the ram;

content: 19 and it was slain,—and Moses dashed the blood against､ the altar､ round about;
content_old: 19 and it was slain,—and Moses dashed the blood against､ the altar､ round about;

content: 20 and the ram itself was cut up into its pieces,—and Moses made a perfume with the head and with the pieces､ and with the fat;
content_old: 20 and the ram itself was cut up into its pieces,—and Moses made a perfume with the head and with the pieces､ and with the fat;

content: 21 but the inwards and the legs were bathed in water,—and Moses made a perfume with the whole ram at the altar､an ascending-sacrifice it was—for a satisfying odour､an altar-flame it was unto Yahweh, As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 21 but the inwards and the legs were bathed in water,—and Moses made a perfume with the whole ram at the altar､an ascending-sacrifice it was—for a satisfying odour､an altar-flame it was unto Yahweh, As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 22 Then was brought near the second ram, the ram of installation,—and Aaron and his sons leaned their hands upon the head of the ram;
content_old: 22 Then was brought near the second ram, the ram of installation,—and Aaron and his sons leaned their hands upon the head of the ram;

content: 23 and it was slain､ and Moses took of the blood thereof, and put upon the tip of Aaron’s right ear,—and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot.
content_old: 23 and it was slain､ and Moses took of the blood thereof, and put upon the tip of Aaron’s right ear,—and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot.

content: 24 Then were brought near the sons of Aaron､ and Moses put of the blood upon the tip of their right ear, and upon the thumb of their right hand, and upon the great toe of their right foot,—and Moses dashed the blood against the altar､ round about.
content_old: 24 Then were brought near the sons of Aaron､ and Moses put of the blood upon the tip of their right ear, and upon the thumb of their right hand, and upon the great toe of their right foot,—and Moses dashed the blood against the altar､ round about.

content: 25 And he took the fat and the fat-tail､ and all the fat that was on the inwards, and the caul of the liver, and the two kidneys､ and their fat,—and the right shoulder;
content_old: 25 And he took the fat and the fat-tail､ and all the fat that was on the inwards, and the caul of the liver, and the two kidneys､ and their fat,—and the right shoulder;

content: 26 and out of the basket of unleavened-cakes that was before Yahweh took he one round unleavened-cake､ and one round oil-cake､ and one wafer,—and put them upon the fat portions, and upon the right shoulder;
content_old: 26 and out of the basket of unleavened-cakes that was before Yahweh took he one round unleavened-cake､ and one round oil-cake､ and one wafer,—and put them upon the fat portions, and upon the right shoulder;

content: 27 and placed the whole upon the opened palms of Aaron, and upon the opened palms of his sons,—and waved them as a wave-offering､ before Yahweh.
content_old: 27 and placed the whole upon the opened palms of Aaron, and upon the opened palms of his sons,—and waved them as a wave-offering､ before Yahweh.

content: 28 And Moses took them from off their opened palms, and made a perfume at the altar upon the ascending-sacrifice,—an installation they were､ for a satisfying odour, an altar-flame it was unto Yahweh.
content_old: 28 And Moses took them from off their opened palms, and made a perfume at the altar upon the ascending-sacrifice,—an installation they were､ for a satisfying odour, an altar-flame it was unto Yahweh.

content: 29 And Moses took the breast, and waved it as a wave-offering､ before Yahweh,—of the ram of installation unto Moses it belonged､ as a portion, As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 29 And Moses took the breast, and waved it as a wave-offering､ before Yahweh,—of the ram of installation unto Moses it belonged､ as a portion, As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 30 And Moses took of the anointing oil､ and of the blood that was upon the altar, and sprinkled upon Aaron､ upon his garments, and upon his sons､ and upon the garments of his sons､ with him,—and hallowed Aaron､ his garments, and his sons､ and the garments of his sons､ with him.
content_old: 30 And Moses took of the anointing oil､ and of the blood that was upon the altar, and sprinkled upon Aaron､ upon his garments, and upon his sons､ and upon the garments of his sons､ with him,—and hallowed Aaron､ his garments, and his sons､ and the garments of his sons､ with him.

content: 31 And Moses said unto Aaron and unto his sons､ Boil ye the flesh､ at the entrance of the tent of meeting, and there shall ye eat it, and the bread which is in the basket of installation,—as I have been commanded､ saying, Aaron and his sons shall eat it.
content_old: 31 And Moses said unto Aaron and unto his sons､ Boil ye the flesh､ at the entrance of the tent of meeting, and there shall ye eat it, and the bread which is in the basket of installation,—as I have been commanded､ saying, Aaron and his sons shall eat it.

content: 32 But that which is left of the flesh､ and of the bread with fire shall ye consume.
content_old: 32 But that which is left of the flesh､ and of the bread with fire shall ye consume.

content: 33 And from the entrance of the tent of meeting shall ye not go forth､ for seven days, until the day that filleth up the days of your installation,—because for seven days will he install you:
content_old: 33 And from the entrance of the tent of meeting shall ye not go forth､ for seven days, until the day that filleth up the days of your installation,—because for seven days will he install you:

content: 34 as hath been done this day so hath Yahweh commanded to be done､ to put a propitiatory-covering over you.
content_old: 34 as hath been done this day so hath Yahweh commanded to be done､ to put a propitiatory-covering over you.

content: 35 Even at the entrance of the tent of meeting shall ye abide､ day and night､ for seven days, and shall keep the watch of Yahweh､ and shall not die,—for so am I commanded.
content_old: 35 Even at the entrance of the tent of meeting shall ye abide､ day and night､ for seven days, and shall keep the watch of Yahweh､ and shall not die,—for so am I commanded.

content: 1 And it came to pass､on the eighth day that Moses called for Aaron､ and for his sons,—and for the elders of Israel;
content_old: 1 And it came to pass､on the eighth day that Moses called for Aaron､ and for his sons,—and for the elders of Israel;

content: 2 and said unto Aaron— Take for thyself a choice calf､ as a sin-bearer､ and a ram for an ascending-sacrifice､ each without defect,—and bring them near before Yahweh;
content_old: 2 and said unto Aaron— Take for thyself a choice calf､ as a sin-bearer､ and a ram for an ascending-sacrifice､ each without defect,—and bring them near before Yahweh;

content: 3 and unto the sons of Israel shalt thou speak､ saying,— Take ye a he-goat､ as a sin-bearer, and a calf and a young sheep､ each a year old､ without defect､ for an ascending-sacrifice;
content_old: 3 and unto the sons of Israel shalt thou speak､ saying,— Take ye a he-goat､ as a sin-bearer, and a calf and a young sheep､ each a year old､ without defect､ for an ascending-sacrifice;

content: 4 and an ox and a ram for peace-offerings､ to sacrifice before Yahweh, and a meal-offering overflowed with oil,—for to-day doth Yahweh appear unto you.
content_old: 4 and an ox and a ram for peace-offerings､ to sacrifice before Yahweh, and a meal-offering overflowed with oil,—for to-day doth Yahweh appear unto you.

content: 5 So they brought that which Moses commanded､ before the tent of meeting,—and all the assembly drew near, and stood before Yahweh.
content_old: 5 So they brought that which Moses commanded､ before the tent of meeting,—and all the assembly drew near, and stood before Yahweh.

content: 6 And Moses said— This is the thing which Yahweh hath commanded that ye shall do,—that the glory of Yahweh may appear unto you.
content_old: 6 And Moses said— This is the thing which Yahweh hath commanded that ye shall do,—that the glory of Yahweh may appear unto you.

content: 7 And Moses said unto Aaron— Draw near unto the altar､ and offer thy sin-bearer､ and thine ascending-sacrifice, and put a propitiatory-covering about thyself､ and about the people,—and offer the oblation of the people､ and put a propitiatory-covering about them, As Yahweh hath commanded.
content_old: 7 And Moses said unto Aaron— Draw near unto the altar､ and offer thy sin-bearer､ and thine ascending-sacrifice, and put a propitiatory-covering about thyself､ and about the people,—and offer the oblation of the people､ and put a propitiatory-covering about them, As Yahweh hath commanded.

content: 8 So Aaron drew near unto the altar,—and slew the sin-bearing calf､ which was for himself;
content_old: 8 So Aaron drew near unto the altar,—and slew the sin-bearing calf､ which was for himself;

content: 9 and the sons of Aaron brought the blood unto him, and he dipped his finger in the blood, and put thereof upon the horns of the altar,—and the remainder of the blood poured he out at the base of the altar;
content_old: 9 and the sons of Aaron brought the blood unto him, and he dipped his finger in the blood, and put thereof upon the horns of the altar,—and the remainder of the blood poured he out at the base of the altar;

content: 10 and with the fat and the kidneys､ and the caul from the liver､ of the sin-bearer made he a perfume at the altar,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 10 and with the fat and the kidneys､ and the caul from the liver､ of the sin-bearer made he a perfume at the altar,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 11 But the flesh and the skin consumed he with fire, outside the camp.
content_old: 11 But the flesh and the skin consumed he with fire, outside the camp.

content: 12 Then slew he the ascending-sacrifice,—and the sons of Aaron presented unto him the blood, and he dashed it against the altar､ round about.
content_old: 12 Then slew he the ascending-sacrifice,—and the sons of Aaron presented unto him the blood, and he dashed it against the altar､ round about.

content: 13 And the ascending-sacrifice presented they unto him､ piece by piece thereof､ also the head,—and he made a perfume upon the altar:
content_old: 13 And the ascending-sacrifice presented they unto him､ piece by piece thereof､ also the head,—and he made a perfume upon the altar:

content: 14 and he bathed the inwards､ and the legs,—and made a perfume upon the ascending-sacrifice､ at the altar.
content_old: 14 and he bathed the inwards､ and the legs,—and made a perfume upon the ascending-sacrifice､ at the altar.

content: 15 Then brought he near the oblation of the people,—and took the sin-bearing goat which pertained to the people, and slew it and made therewith a sin-bearer､ like the first.
content_old: 15 Then brought he near the oblation of the people,—and took the sin-bearing goat which pertained to the people, and slew it and made therewith a sin-bearer､ like the first.

content: 16 Then brought he near the ascending-sacrifice,—and offered it､ according to the regulation.
content_old: 16 Then brought he near the ascending-sacrifice,—and offered it､ according to the regulation.

content: 17 Then brought he near the meal-offering, and filled his hand therefrom, and made a perfume upon the altar,—in addition to the ascending-sacrifice of the morning.
content_old: 17 Then brought he near the meal-offering, and filled his hand therefrom, and made a perfume upon the altar,—in addition to the ascending-sacrifice of the morning.

content: 18 Then slew he the ox､ and the ram, as a peace-offering､ which pertained unto the people,—and the sons of Aaron presented the blood unto him, and he dashed it against the altar､ round about;
content_old: 18 Then slew he the ox､ and the ram, as a peace-offering､ which pertained unto the people,—and the sons of Aaron presented the blood unto him, and he dashed it against the altar､ round about;

content: 19 and the portions of fat､ from the ox,—and from the ram, the fat-tail､ and the covering､ and the kidneys, and the caul of the liver;
content_old: 19 and the portions of fat､ from the ox,—and from the ram, the fat-tail､ and the covering､ and the kidneys, and the caul of the liver;

content: 20 and they put the portions of fat upon the breasts,—and he made a perfume with the fat at the altar;
content_old: 20 and they put the portions of fat upon the breasts,—and he made a perfume with the fat at the altar;

content: 21 but the breasts and the right shoulder did Aaron wave as a wave-offering､ before Yahweh,—as Moses commanded.
content_old: 21 but the breasts and the right shoulder did Aaron wave as a wave-offering､ before Yahweh,—as Moses commanded.

content: 22 Then Aaron lifted up his hands towards the people､ and blessed them,—and he came down from offering the sin-bearer､ and the ascending-sacrifice､ and the peace-offering.
content_old: 22 Then Aaron lifted up his hands towards the people､ and blessed them,—and he came down from offering the sin-bearer､ and the ascending-sacrifice､ and the peace-offering.

content: 23 And when Moses and Aaron had entered into the tent of meeting,—and had come forth､ and blessed the people then appeared the glory of Yahweh､ unto all the people;
content_old: 23 And when Moses and Aaron had entered into the tent of meeting,—and had come forth､ and blessed the people then appeared the glory of Yahweh､ unto all the people;

content: 1 Then Aaron’s sons､ Nadab and Abihu､ took each man his censer､ and placed therein fire, and put thereon incense,—and brought near before Yahweh､ strange fire, which he had not commanded them.
content_old: 1 Then Aaron’s sons､ Nadab and Abihu､ took each man his censer､ and placed therein fire, and put thereon incense,—and brought near before Yahweh､ strange fire, which he had not commanded them.

content: 2 Then came there forth fire from before Yahweh, and consumed them,—and they died before Yahweh.
content_old: 2 Then came there forth fire from before Yahweh, and consumed them,—and they died before Yahweh.

content: 3 Then said Moses unto Aaron— The very thing that Yahweh spake､ saying— In them that draw near to me must I be hallowed, And before the faces of all the people must I get myself honour,— And Aaron was dumb.
content_old: 3 Then said Moses unto Aaron— The very thing that Yahweh spake､ saying— In them that draw near to me must I be hallowed, And before the faces of all the people must I get myself honour,— And Aaron was dumb.
