content: 21 And Aaron shall lean his two hands､ upon the head of the living goat, and confess over him､ all the iniquities of the sons of Israel, and all their transgressions､ to the extent of all their sins,—and shall put them upon the head of the goat, and then send him away､ by the hand of a man appointed､ towards the desert:
content_old: 21 And Aaron shall lean his two hands､ upon the head of the living goat, and confess over him､ all the iniquities of the sons of Israel, and all their transgressions､ to the extent of all their sins,—and shall put them upon the head of the goat, and then send him away､ by the hand of a man appointed､ towards the desert:

content: 22 so shall the goat bear upon him all their iniquities､ into a lone land,—and he shall set the goat free､ in the desert.
content_old: 22 so shall the goat bear upon him all their iniquities､ into a lone land,—and he shall set the goat free､ in the desert.

content: 23 Then shall Aaron come into the tent of meeting, and put off the linen garments which he put on when he came into the holy place,—and shall leave them there;
content_old: 23 Then shall Aaron come into the tent of meeting, and put off the linen garments which he put on when he came into the holy place,—and shall leave them there;

content: 24 and shall bathe his flesh in water､ in a holy place, and put on his other garments,—and go forth､ and offer his own ascending-sacrifice､ and the ascending-sacrifice of the people, so shall he put a propitiatory-covering about himself､ and about the people;
content_old: 24 and shall bathe his flesh in water､ in a holy place, and put on his other garments,—and go forth､ and offer his own ascending-sacrifice､ and the ascending-sacrifice of the people, so shall he put a propitiatory-covering about himself､ and about the people;

content: 25 and with the fat of the sin-bearer shall he make a perfume at the altar.
content_old: 25 and with the fat of the sin-bearer shall he make a perfume at the altar.

content: 26 And he that sent away the goat unto Azazel shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water,��and after that shall he come into the camp.
content_old: 26 And he that sent away the goat unto Azazel shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water,��and after that shall he come into the camp.

content: 27 And the sin-bearing bullock､ and the sin-bearing goat､ whose blood was brought in to make a propitiatory-covering in the holy place shall be carried forth､ outside the camp,—and they shall burn up､ in fire their skins and their flesh､ and their dung;
content_old: 27 And the sin-bearing bullock､ and the sin-bearing goat､ whose blood was brought in to make a propitiatory-covering in the holy place shall be carried forth､ outside the camp,—and they shall burn up､ in fire their skins and their flesh､ and their dung;

content: 28 and he that hath burned them shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water,—and after that shall he come into the camp.
content_old: 28 and he that hath burned them shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water,—and after that shall he come into the camp.

content: 29 And it shall become unto you, a statute age-abiding,— In the seventh month､ on the tenth of the month Shall ye humble your souls､ And no work shall ye do, The homeborn､ Or the sojourner that sojourneth in your midst;
content_old: 29 And it shall become unto you, a statute age-abiding,— In the seventh month､ on the tenth of the month Shall ye humble your souls､ And no work shall ye do, The homeborn､ Or the sojourner that sojourneth in your midst;

content: 30 For on this day shall a propitiatory-covering be put over you､ to cleanse you,— From all your sins before Yahweh shall ye be clean.
content_old: 30 For on this day shall a propitiatory-covering be put over you､ to cleanse you,— From all your sins before Yahweh shall ye be clean.

content: 31 A sabbath of sacred rest it is unto you, Therefore shall ye humble your souls, A statute age-abiding.
content_old: 31 A sabbath of sacred rest it is unto you, Therefore shall ye humble your souls, A statute age-abiding.

content: 32 Therefore shall the priest who shall be anointed､ and installed, to minister as priest in the stead of his father､make propitiation,— So then he shall put on the linen garments､ the holy garments;
content_old: 32 Therefore shall the priest who shall be anointed､ and installed, to minister as priest in the stead of his father､make propitiation,— So then he shall put on the linen garments､ the holy garments;

content: 33 And make propitiation for the holy sanctuary, And for the tent of meeting､ and for the altar shall he make propitiation,— Over the priests also､ and over all the people of the convocation shall he put a covering by propitiation.
content_old: 33 And make propitiation for the holy sanctuary, And for the tent of meeting､ and for the altar shall he make propitiation,— Over the priests also､ and over all the people of the convocation shall he put a covering by propitiation.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:—
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:—

content: 2 Speak unto Aaron､ and unto his sons､ and unto all the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them,— This is the thing which Yahweh hath commanded､ saying:
content_old: 2 Speak unto Aaron､ and unto his sons､ and unto all the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them,— This is the thing which Yahweh hath commanded､ saying:

content: 3 What man soever there be of the house of Israel, who slayeth an ox or lamb or goat､ in the camp,—or who slayeth it outside the camp;
content_old: 3 What man soever there be of the house of Israel, who slayeth an ox or lamb or goat､ in the camp,—or who slayeth it outside the camp;

content: 4 and unto the entrance of the tent of meeting bringeth it not in, to present it as an oblation unto Yahweh, before the habitation of Yahweh blood shall be imputed to that man—blood hath he shed, therefore shall that man be cut off from the midst of his people:
content_old: 4 and unto the entrance of the tent of meeting bringeth it not in, to present it as an oblation unto Yahweh, before the habitation of Yahweh blood shall be imputed to that man—blood hath he shed, therefore shall that man be cut off from the midst of his people:

content: 5 to the end that the sons of Israel may bring in their sacrifices which they are offering upon the face of the field, that they may bring them in unto Yahweh—unto the entrance of the tent of meeting､ unto the priest,—and that so as peace-offerings unto Yahweh they may offer them.
content_old: 5 to the end that the sons of Israel may bring in their sacrifices which they are offering upon the face of the field, that they may bring them in unto Yahweh—unto the entrance of the tent of meeting､ unto the priest,—and that so as peace-offerings unto Yahweh they may offer them.

content: 6 Then shall the priest dash the blood against the altar of Yahweh, at the entrance of the tent of meeting,—and shall make a perfume of the fat, as a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh;
content_old: 6 Then shall the priest dash the blood against the altar of Yahweh, at the entrance of the tent of meeting,—and shall make a perfume of the fat, as a satisfying odour､ unto Yahweh;

content: 7 so shall they no more offer their sacrifices unto demons､ after whom they are unchastely going away,— a statute age-abiding shall this be to them, unto their generations.
content_old: 7 so shall they no more offer their sacrifices unto demons､ after whom they are unchastely going away,— a statute age-abiding shall this be to them, unto their generations.

content: 8 Wherefore unto them shalt thou say: What man soever there may be of the house of Israel, or of the sojourners that sojourn in their midst,—who causeth to go up an ascending-offering､ or a sacrifice;
content_old: 8 Wherefore unto them shalt thou say: What man soever there may be of the house of Israel, or of the sojourners that sojourn in their midst,—who causeth to go up an ascending-offering､ or a sacrifice;

content: 9 and unto the entrance of the tent of meeting doth not bring it in, to offer it unto Yahweh then shall that man be cut off from among his kinsfolk.
content_old: 9 and unto the entrance of the tent of meeting doth not bring it in, to offer it unto Yahweh then shall that man be cut off from among his kinsfolk.

content: 10 And what man soever there may be of the house of Israel, or of the sojourners that sojourn in their midst, that partaketh of any manner of blood then will I set my face against the person that partaketh of the blood, and will cut him off from the midst of his people.
content_old: 10 And what man soever there may be of the house of Israel, or of the sojourners that sojourn in their midst, that partaketh of any manner of blood then will I set my face against the person that partaketh of the blood, and will cut him off from the midst of his people.

content: 11 For as for the life of the flesh in the blood it is, therefore have I given it unto you upon the altar, to put a propitiatory-covering over your lives,—for the blood it is､ which by virtue of the life maketh propitiation.
content_old: 11 For as for the life of the flesh in the blood it is, therefore have I given it unto you upon the altar, to put a propitiatory-covering over your lives,—for the blood it is､ which by virtue of the life maketh propitiation.

content: 12 For this cause have I said unto the sons of Israel, Not a person from among you shall partake of blood,— Even the sojourner that sojourneth in your midst shall not partake of blood.
content_old: 12 For this cause have I said unto the sons of Israel, Not a person from among you shall partake of blood,— Even the sojourner that sojourneth in your midst shall not partake of blood.

content: 13 And what man soever there may be､ of the sons of Israel､ or of the sojourners that sojourn in their midst, who taketh by hunting any wild-beast or bird that may be eaten then shall he pour out the blood thereof, and cover it with dust;
content_old: 13 And what man soever there may be､ of the sons of Israel､ or of the sojourners that sojourn in their midst, who taketh by hunting any wild-beast or bird that may be eaten then shall he pour out the blood thereof, and cover it with dust;

content: 14 for as for the life of all flesh the blood thereof for the life thereof standeth, therefore have I said unto the sons of Israel— Of the blood of no manner of flesh shall ye partake. For the life of all flesh is the blood thereof; whoso partaketh thereof shall be cut off.
content_old: 14 for as for the life of all flesh the blood thereof for the life thereof standeth, therefore have I said unto the sons of Israel— Of the blood of no manner of flesh shall ye partake. For the life of all flesh is the blood thereof; whoso partaketh thereof shall be cut off.

content: 15 And in the case of any person who eateth that which died of itself or was torn in pieces, whether he be home-born､ or a sojourner then shall he wash his clothes､ and bathe in water､ and be unclean until the evening､ and then be clean.
content_old: 15 And in the case of any person who eateth that which died of itself or was torn in pieces, whether he be home-born､ or a sojourner then shall he wash his clothes､ and bathe in water､ and be unclean until the evening､ and then be clean.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them,— I—Yahweh am your God:—
content_old: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them,— I—Yahweh am your God:—

content: 3 After the doings of the land of Egypt wherein ye dwelt shall ye not do,— And after the doings of the land of Canaan､ whither I am bringing you in shall ye not do, And in their statutes shall ye not walk:
content_old: 3 After the doings of the land of Egypt wherein ye dwelt shall ye not do,— And after the doings of the land of Canaan､ whither I am bringing you in shall ye not do, And in their statutes shall ye not walk:

content: 4 My regulations shall ye do､ And my statutes shall ye observe､ to walk therein,— l—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 4 My regulations shall ye do､ And my statutes shall ye observe､ to walk therein,— l—Yahweh am your God.

content: 5 Therefore shall ye observe my statutes､ and my regulations, Which if the son of earth shall do them Then shall he live in them,— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 5 Therefore shall ye observe my statutes､ and my regulations, Which if the son of earth shall do them Then shall he live in them,— I am Yahweh.

content: 6 No person whatsoever unto any of the near kin of his own flesh shall approach､ to uncover the parts of shame,— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 6 No person whatsoever unto any of the near kin of his own flesh shall approach､ to uncover the parts of shame,— I am Yahweh.

content: 7 The shame of thy father, even the shame of thy mother shalt thou not uncover,—thy mother she is, thou shalt not uncover her shame.
content_old: 7 The shame of thy father, even the shame of thy mother shalt thou not uncover,—thy mother she is, thou shalt not uncover her shame.

content: 8 The shame of thy father’s wife shalt thou not uncover,—thy father’s shame it is.
content_old: 8 The shame of thy father’s wife shalt thou not uncover,—thy father’s shame it is.

content: 9 The shame of thy sister､ daughter of thy father､ or daughter of thy mother, born at home or born abroad thou shalt not uncover their shame.
content_old: 9 The shame of thy sister､ daughter of thy father､ or daughter of thy mother, born at home or born abroad thou shalt not uncover their shame.

content: 10 The shame of the daughter of thy son､ or the daughter of thy daughter thou shalt not uncover their shame,—for thine own shame they are.
content_old: 10 The shame of the daughter of thy son､ or the daughter of thy daughter thou shalt not uncover their shame,—for thine own shame they are.

content: 11 The shame of the daughter of thy father’s wife, born to thy father, she being thy sister thou shalt not uncover her shame.
content_old: 11 The shame of the daughter of thy father’s wife, born to thy father, she being thy sister thou shalt not uncover her shame.

content: 12 The shame of thy father’s sister shalt thou not uncover,— thy father’s near of kin she is.
content_old: 12 The shame of thy father’s sister shalt thou not uncover,— thy father’s near of kin she is.

content: 13 The shame of thy mother’s sister shalt thou not uncover,—for thy mother’s near of kin she is.
content_old: 13 The shame of thy mother’s sister shalt thou not uncover,—for thy mother’s near of kin she is.

content: 14 The shame of thy father’s brother shalt thou not uncover unto his wife shalt thou not approach, thine aunt she is.
content_old: 14 The shame of thy father’s brother shalt thou not uncover unto his wife shalt thou not approach, thine aunt she is.

content: 15 The shame of thy daughter-in-law shalt thou not uncover,—thy son’s wife she is, thou shalt not uncover her shame.
content_old: 15 The shame of thy daughter-in-law shalt thou not uncover,—thy son’s wife she is, thou shalt not uncover her shame.

content: 16 The shame of thy brother’s wife shalt thou not uncover,—the shame of thy brother it is.
content_old: 16 The shame of thy brother’s wife shalt thou not uncover,—the shame of thy brother it is.

content: 17 The shame of a woman､ and of her daughter shalt thou not uncover,—neither the daughter of her son nor the daughter of her daughter shalt thou take, to uncover her shame, near of kin they are, wickedness it is.
content_old: 17 The shame of a woman､ and of her daughter shalt thou not uncover,—neither the daughter of her son nor the daughter of her daughter shalt thou take, to uncover her shame, near of kin they are, wickedness it is.

content: 18 And a woman unto her sister shalt thou not take,—to cause rivalry､ by uncovering her shame､ besides her own､ while she is living.
content_old: 18 And a woman unto her sister shalt thou not take,—to cause rivalry､ by uncovering her shame､ besides her own､ while she is living.

content: 19 And unto a woman during her removal for uncleanness shalt thou not approach, to uncover her shame.
content_old: 19 And unto a woman during her removal for uncleanness shalt thou not approach, to uncover her shame.

content: 20 And of the wife of thy neighbour shalt thou not have carnal knowledge,—to commit uncleanness with her.
content_old: 20 And of the wife of thy neighbour shalt thou not have carnal knowledge,—to commit uncleanness with her.

content: 21 And none of thy seed shalt thou deliver up､ to cause to pass through to Molech,—that thou profane not the name of thy God､ I am Yahweh.
content_old: 21 And none of thy seed shalt thou deliver up､ to cause to pass through to Molech,—that thou profane not the name of thy God､ I am Yahweh.

content: 22 And with mankind shalt thou not lie､ as with womankind,—an abomination it is.
content_old: 22 And with mankind shalt thou not lie､ as with womankind,—an abomination it is.

content: 23 And of no beast shalt thou have carnal knowledge､ to commit uncleanness therewith,—neither shall a woman present herself to a beast to couch down thereto,—confusion it is.
content_old: 23 And of no beast shalt thou have carnal knowledge､ to commit uncleanness therewith,—neither shall a woman present herself to a beast to couch down thereto,—confusion it is.

content: 24 Do not make yourselves unclean､ in any of these things,— For in all these things have the nations made themselves unclean, whom I am sending out from before you.
content_old: 24 Do not make yourselves unclean､ in any of these things,— For in all these things have the nations made themselves unclean, whom I am sending out from before you.

content: 25 Therefore hath the land become unclean, and I have visited the iniquity thereof upon it,—and the land hath vomited her inhabitants.
content_old: 25 Therefore hath the land become unclean, and I have visited the iniquity thereof upon it,—and the land hath vomited her inhabitants.

content: 26 Ye therefore､ shall observe my statutes and my regulations, and have nothing to do with any of these abominations,—whether the home-born, or the sojourner that sojourneth in your midst;
content_old: 26 Ye therefore､ shall observe my statutes and my regulations, and have nothing to do with any of these abominations,—whether the home-born, or the sojourner that sojourneth in your midst;

content: 27 For all these abominations have the men of the land done､ who were before you; And so the land hath become unclean:
content_old: 27 For all these abominations have the men of the land done､ who were before you; And so the land hath become unclean:

content: 28 So shall the land not vomit you, through your making it unclean,—as it vomited the nation which was before you.
content_old: 28 So shall the land not vomit you, through your making it unclean,—as it vomited the nation which was before you.

content: 29 For whosoever shall have anything to do with any of these abominations the persons who have shall be cut off out of the midst of their people.
content_old: 29 For whosoever shall have anything to do with any of these abominations the persons who have shall be cut off out of the midst of their people.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Speak unto all the assembly of the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them— Holy shall ye be,— For holy am I—Yahweh—your God
content_old: 2 Speak unto all the assembly of the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them— Holy shall ye be,— For holy am I—Yahweh—your God

content: 3 Ye shall every one revere his father and his mother And my sabbaths shall ye observe,— I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 3 Ye shall every one revere his father and his mother And my sabbaths shall ye observe,— I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 4 Do not turn unto things of nought, And molten gods shall ye not make to yourselves,— I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 4 Do not turn unto things of nought, And molten gods shall ye not make to yourselves,— I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 5 And when ye would offer a peace-offering unto Yahweh ye shall offer it that ye may be accepted.
content_old: 5 And when ye would offer a peace-offering unto Yahweh ye shall offer it that ye may be accepted.

content: 6 On the day ye offer it shall it be eaten､ and on the morrow,—but that which remaineth until the third day in fire shall be consumed.
content_old: 6 On the day ye offer it shall it be eaten､ and on the morrow,—but that which remaineth until the third day in fire shall be consumed.

content: 7 And if it be eaten on the third day unclean it is､ it shall not be accepted.
content_old: 7 And if it be eaten on the third day unclean it is､ it shall not be accepted.

content: 8 But he that eateth it his iniquity shall bear, because that which had been hallowed unto Yahweh hath he profaned,—so then that person shall be cut off from among his kinsfolk.
content_old: 8 But he that eateth it his iniquity shall bear, because that which had been hallowed unto Yahweh hath he profaned,—so then that person shall be cut off from among his kinsfolk.

content: 9 And when ye reap the harvest of your land thou shalt not wholly clear the border of thy field､ in reaping,—nor shalt thou gather up the gleaning of thy harvest.
content_old: 9 And when ye reap the harvest of your land thou shalt not wholly clear the border of thy field､ in reaping,—nor shalt thou gather up the gleaning of thy harvest.

content: 10 And thy vineyard shalt thou not go over again, nor gather every single grape: for the poor and for the sojourner shalt thou leave them, I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 10 And thy vineyard shalt thou not go over again, nor gather every single grape: for the poor and for the sojourner shalt thou leave them, I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 11 Ye shall not steal,—nor deceive nor lie､ one man to another;
content_old: 11 Ye shall not steal,—nor deceive nor lie､ one man to another;

content: 12 Nor swear by my name､ falsely,— And so profane the name of thy God: I am Yahweh.
content_old: 12 Nor swear by my name､ falsely,— And so profane the name of thy God: I am Yahweh.

content: 13 Thou shalt not oppress thy neighbour nor rob him,— The wages of him that is hired shall not tarry with thee､ until the morning.
content_old: 13 Thou shalt not oppress thy neighbour nor rob him,— The wages of him that is hired shall not tarry with thee､ until the morning.

content: 14 Thou shalt not curse the deaf, Nor before the blind place a stumbling-block,— So shalt thou stand in awe of thy God､ I am Yahweh.
content_old: 14 Thou shalt not curse the deaf, Nor before the blind place a stumbling-block,— So shalt thou stand in awe of thy God､ I am Yahweh.

content: 15 Ye shall not act perversely in giving judgment, Thou shalt neither respect the person of the poor, Nor prefer the person of the great,— In righteousness shalt thou judge thy neighbour.
content_old: 15 Ye shall not act perversely in giving judgment, Thou shalt neither respect the person of the poor, Nor prefer the person of the great,— In righteousness shalt thou judge thy neighbour.

content: 16 Thou shalt not go about talebearing､ among thy people, Thou shalt not stand by､ over the blood of thy neighbour: I am Yahweh.
content_old: 16 Thou shalt not go about talebearing､ among thy people, Thou shalt not stand by､ over the blood of thy neighbour: I am Yahweh.

content: 17 Thou shalt not hate thy brother､ in thy heart,— Thou shalt faithfully reprove thy neighbour, and not countenance him､ in sin:
content_old: 17 Thou shalt not hate thy brother､ in thy heart,— Thou shalt faithfully reprove thy neighbour, and not countenance him､ in sin:

content: 18 Thou shalt not take vengeance､ neither shalt thou cherish anger against the sons of thy people, So shalt thou love thy neighbour､ as thyself,— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 18 Thou shalt not take vengeance､ neither shalt thou cherish anger against the sons of thy people, So shalt thou love thy neighbour､ as thyself,— I am Yahweh.

content: 19 My statutes shall ye observe, Thy beasts shalt thou not cause to breed in two kinds, Thy field shalt thou not sow with two sorts of seed,—
content_old: 19 My statutes shall ye observe, Thy beasts shalt thou not cause to breed in two kinds, Thy field shalt thou not sow with two sorts of seed,—

content: 20 And a garment woven of diverse threads shalt thou not suffer to come upon thee. And whosoever lieth carnally with a woman､ she being a bondmaid､ acquired for a husband, and neither redeemed nor freedom given her inquisition shall be made､ they shall not be put to death､ because she was not free;
content_old: 20 And a garment woven of diverse threads shalt thou not suffer to come upon thee. And whosoever lieth carnally with a woman､ she being a bondmaid､ acquired for a husband, and neither redeemed nor freedom given her inquisition shall be made､ they shall not be put to death､ because she was not free;

content: 21 but he shall bring in his guilt-bearer unto Yahweh, unto the entrance of the tent of meeting,—even a ram as a guilt-bearer;
content_old: 21 but he shall bring in his guilt-bearer unto Yahweh, unto the entrance of the tent of meeting,—even a ram as a guilt-bearer;

content: 22 and the priest shall put a propitiatory-covering over him､ with the guilt-bearing ram､ before Yahweh, on account of his sin which he hath committed,—so shall he have forgiveness, from his sin which he hath committed.
content_old: 22 and the priest shall put a propitiatory-covering over him､ with the guilt-bearing ram､ before Yahweh, on account of his sin which he hath committed,—so shall he have forgiveness, from his sin which he hath committed.

content: 23 And when ye come into the land､ and plant any manner of fruit-tree then shall ye count as uncircumcised the fruit thereof, three years shall it be to you as if unclean, it shall not be eaten.
content_old: 23 And when ye come into the land､ and plant any manner of fruit-tree then shall ye count as uncircumcised the fruit thereof, three years shall it be to you as if unclean, it shall not be eaten.

content: 24 But in the fourth year all the fruit thereof shall be hallowed for a festival of thanksgivings unto Yahweh.
content_old: 24 But in the fourth year all the fruit thereof shall be hallowed for a festival of thanksgivings unto Yahweh.

content: 25 And in the fifth year shall ye eat the fruit thereof, that it may enrich you with its increase,— I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 25 And in the fifth year shall ye eat the fruit thereof, that it may enrich you with its increase,— I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 26 Ye shall eat nothing with the blood thereof,— Ye shall not practise divination､ neither shall ye use magic.
content_old: 26 Ye shall eat nothing with the blood thereof,— Ye shall not practise divination､ neither shall ye use magic.

content: 27 Ye shall not shave in a circle around your head,—nor shalt thou disfigure the fringe of thy beard.
content_old: 27 Ye shall not shave in a circle around your head,—nor shalt thou disfigure the fringe of thy beard.

content: 28 Cuttings for a dead person shall ye not make in your flesh. And punctures in your persons shall ye not print,— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 28 Cuttings for a dead person shall ye not make in your flesh. And punctures in your persons shall ye not print,— I am Yahweh.

content: 29 Do not profane thy daughter､ by causing her to be unchaste,—lest the land fall to unchastity, and so the land be filled with wickedness.
content_old: 29 Do not profane thy daughter､ by causing her to be unchaste,—lest the land fall to unchastity, and so the land be filled with wickedness.

content: 30 My sabbaths shall ye observe, And my sanctuary shall ye revere,— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 30 My sabbaths shall ye observe, And my sanctuary shall ye revere,— I am Yahweh.

content: 31 Do not turn unto mediums､ Nor for oracles make search､ To render yourselves unclean with them,— I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 31 Do not turn unto mediums､ Nor for oracles make search､ To render yourselves unclean with them,— I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 32 Before a hoary head shalt thou rise up, And shalt honour the presence of an elder,— So shalt thou stand in awe of thy God— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 32 Before a hoary head shalt thou rise up, And shalt honour the presence of an elder,— So shalt thou stand in awe of thy God— I am Yahweh.

content: 33 And when there sojourneth with thee a sojourner､ in your land ye shall not oppress him:
content_old: 33 And when there sojourneth with thee a sojourner､ in your land ye shall not oppress him:

content: 34 As one home born from among yourselves shall be unto you the sojourner who sojourneth with you､ So shalt thou love him as thyself, For sojourners became ye､ in the land of Egypt,— I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 34 As one home born from among yourselves shall be unto you the sojourner who sojourneth with you､ So shalt thou love him as thyself, For sojourners became ye､ in the land of Egypt,— I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 35 Ye shall not act perversely in giving judgment,—in measures of extent､ in weights､ in measures of capacity:
content_old: 35 Ye shall not act perversely in giving judgment,—in measures of extent､ in weights､ in measures of capacity:

content: 36 Just balances､ just weights､ a just ephah､ and a just him shall ye have,— I—Yahweh am your God, who brought you forth out of the land of Egypt.
content_old: 36 Just balances､ just weights､ a just ephah､ and a just him shall ye have,— I—Yahweh am your God, who brought you forth out of the land of Egypt.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Unto the sons of Israel therefore､ shalt thou say, What man soever there may be of the sons of Israel､ or of the sojourners that sojourn in Israel､ that giveth of his seed unto Molech he shall surely be put to death,—the people of the land shall stone him with stones;
content_old: 2 Unto the sons of Israel therefore､ shalt thou say, What man soever there may be of the sons of Israel､ or of the sojourners that sojourn in Israel､ that giveth of his seed unto Molech he shall surely be put to death,—the people of the land shall stone him with stones;

content: 3 I､ also will set my face against that man, and will cut him off out of the midst of his people,—because of his seed hath he given unto Molech, seeing that he hath made unclean my sanctuary, even to the extent of profaning my holy name.
content_old: 3 I､ also will set my face against that man, and will cut him off out of the midst of his people,—because of his seed hath he given unto Molech, seeing that he hath made unclean my sanctuary, even to the extent of profaning my holy name.

content: 4 But if the people of the land do even hide their eyes from that man, when he giveth of his seed unto Molech,—so as not to put him to death
content_old: 4 But if the people of the land do even hide their eyes from that man, when he giveth of his seed unto Molech,—so as not to put him to death

content: 5 then will I myself set my face against that man､ and against his family,—and will cut him off､ and all that follow unchastely after him—in going unchastely after Molech—out of the midst of their people.
content_old: 5 then will I myself set my face against that man､ and against his family,—and will cut him off､ and all that follow unchastely after him—in going unchastely after Molech—out of the midst of their people.

content: 6 The person also that turneth unto mediums and unto oracles, in going unchastely after them then will I set my face against that person, and will cut him off out of the midst of his people.
content_old: 6 The person also that turneth unto mediums and unto oracles, in going unchastely after them then will I set my face against that person, and will cut him off out of the midst of his people.

content: 7 Therefore shall ye hallow yourselves and be holy,— Because I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 7 Therefore shall ye hallow yourselves and be holy,— Because I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 8 Therefore shall ye observe my statutes, and do them,— I—Yahweh am he that is hallowing you.
content_old: 8 Therefore shall ye observe my statutes, and do them,— I—Yahweh am he that is hallowing you.

content: 9 When any man whatsoever curseth his father or his mother he shall surely be put to death,—his father or his mother hath he cursed､ his blood shall be upon himself.
content_old: 9 When any man whatsoever curseth his father or his mother he shall surely be put to death,—his father or his mother hath he cursed､ his blood shall be upon himself.

content: 10 And any man who committeth adultery with the wife of any other man he that committeth adultery with the wife of his neighbour shall surely be put to death—the adulterer､ and the adulteress.
content_old: 10 And any man who committeth adultery with the wife of any other man he that committeth adultery with the wife of his neighbour shall surely be put to death—the adulterer､ and the adulteress.

content: 11 And any man who lieth with his father’s wife the shame of his father hath uncovered,—they both shall surely be put to death—their blood shall be upon themselves.
content_old: 11 And any man who lieth with his father’s wife the shame of his father hath uncovered,—they both shall surely be put to death—their blood shall be upon themselves.

content: 12 And any man who lieth with his daughter-in-law they both shall surely be put to death confusion have they wrought—their blood shall be upon themselves.
content_old: 12 And any man who lieth with his daughter-in-law they both shall surely be put to death confusion have they wrought—their blood shall be upon themselves.

content: 13 And any man who lieth with mankind as with womankind an abomination have both of them wrought,—they shall surely be put to death—their blood shall be upon themselves.
content_old: 13 And any man who lieth with mankind as with womankind an abomination have both of them wrought,—they shall surely be put to death—their blood shall be upon themselves.

content: 14 And anyman who taketh a woman and her mother wickedness it is,—in fire shall both he and they be consumed, that wickedness be not in your midst.
content_old: 14 And anyman who taketh a woman and her mother wickedness it is,—in fire shall both he and they be consumed, that wickedness be not in your midst.

content: 15 And any man who hath carnal knowledge of a beast shall surely be put to death,—and the beast shall ye slay.
content_old: 15 And any man who hath carnal knowledge of a beast shall surely be put to death,—and the beast shall ye slay.

content: 16 And a woman who approacheth unto any beast､ to couch down thereto then shalt thou slay the woman and the beast,—they shall surely be put to death—their blood shall be upon themselves.
content_old: 16 And a woman who approacheth unto any beast､ to couch down thereto then shalt thou slay the woman and the beast,—they shall surely be put to death—their blood shall be upon themselves.

content: 17 And any man who taketh his sister—his father’s daughter or his mother’s daughter､ and vieweth her shame､ and she vieweth his shame a disgrace it is,—they shall therefore be cut off in the sight of the sons of their people,—the shame of his sister hath he uncovered—his iniquity shall he bear.
content_old: 17 And any man who taketh his sister—his father’s daughter or his mother’s daughter､ and vieweth her shame､ and she vieweth his shame a disgrace it is,—they shall therefore be cut off in the sight of the sons of their people,—the shame of his sister hath he uncovered—his iniquity shall he bear.

content: 18 And any man who lieth with a woman having her sickness､ and uncovereth her shame her fountain hath he exposed, shell also hath uncovered her fountain of blood,—they shall therefore both be cut off､ out of the midst of their people.
content_old: 18 And any man who lieth with a woman having her sickness､ and uncovereth her shame her fountain hath he exposed, shell also hath uncovered her fountain of blood,—they shall therefore both be cut off､ out of the midst of their people.

content: 19 And the shame of thy mother’s sister､ or of thy father’s sister shalt thou not uncover,—for his near of kin hath he exposed—their iniquity shall they bear.
content_old: 19 And the shame of thy mother’s sister､ or of thy father’s sister shalt thou not uncover,—for his near of kin hath he exposed—their iniquity shall they bear.

content: 20 And any man who lieth with his uncle’s wife the shame of his uncle hath he uncovered,—their sin shall they bear—childless shall they die.
content_old: 20 And any man who lieth with his uncle’s wife the shame of his uncle hath he uncovered,—their sin shall they bear—childless shall they die.

content: 21 And any man who taketh his brother’s wife impurity it is,—the shame of his brother hath he uncovered—childless shall they remain.
content_old: 21 And any man who taketh his brother’s wife impurity it is,—the shame of his brother hath he uncovered—childless shall they remain.

content: 22 Therefore shall ye observe all my statutes､ and all my regulations, and do them,— So shall the land､ whereinto I am bringing you to dwell therein､not vomit you forth;
content_old: 22 Therefore shall ye observe all my statutes､ and all my regulations, and do them,— So shall the land､ whereinto I am bringing you to dwell therein､not vomit you forth;

content: 23 So shall ye not walk in the statutes of the nation which I am casting out from before you,— For all these things had they done, Therefore I abhorred them;
content_old: 23 So shall ye not walk in the statutes of the nation which I am casting out from before you,— For all these things had they done, Therefore I abhorred them;

content: 24 And said unto you— Ye shall possess their soil, Yea I myself will give it you to possess it, A land flowing with milk and honey,— I—Yahweh am your God, who have distinguished you from the peoples;
content_old: 24 And said unto you— Ye shall possess their soil, Yea I myself will give it you to possess it, A land flowing with milk and honey,— I—Yahweh am your God, who have distinguished you from the peoples;

content: 25 Therefore shall ye make a distinction— Between the clean beasts､ and the unclean,— And between the unclean birds, and the clean,— So shall ye not make your persons abominable with beast､ or with bird or with anything which creepeth upon the ground, which I have distinguished for you as unclean.
content_old: 25 Therefore shall ye make a distinction— Between the clean beasts､ and the unclean,— And between the unclean birds, and the clean,— So shall ye not make your persons abominable with beast､ or with bird or with anything which creepeth upon the ground, which I have distinguished for you as unclean.

content: 26 Therefore shall ye be unto me､ holy persons, for holy am I—Yahweh,— Therefore have I distinguished you from the peoples､ that ye may be mine.
content_old: 26 Therefore shall ye be unto me､ holy persons, for holy am I—Yahweh,— Therefore have I distinguished you from the peoples､ that ye may be mine.

content: 1 And Yahweh said unto Moses, Say unto the priests､ the sons of Aaron,—yea thou shalt say unto them, For a dead person shall no one make himself unclean､ among his people:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh said unto Moses, Say unto the priests､ the sons of Aaron,—yea thou shalt say unto them, For a dead person shall no one make himself unclean､ among his people:

content: 2 Saving for his kin､ that are near unto him, for his mother or for his father, or for his son or for his daughter, or for his brother;
content_old: 2 Saving for his kin､ that are near unto him, for his mother or for his father, or for his son or for his daughter, or for his brother;

content: 3 or for his sister､ a virgin who is near unto him, who belongeth not unto a husband,—for her he may make himself unclean:
content_old: 3 or for his sister､ a virgin who is near unto him, who belongeth not unto a husband,—for her he may make himself unclean:

content: 4 He shall not make himself unclean､ being a chief among his people,—by profaning himself:
content_old: 4 He shall not make himself unclean､ being a chief among his people,—by profaning himself:

content: 5 They shall not make a baldness behind in their head, And the border of their beard shall they not cut off,— And in their flesh shall they not make incisions.
content_old: 5 They shall not make a baldness behind in their head, And the border of their beard shall they not cut off,— And in their flesh shall they not make incisions.

content: 6 Holy persons shall they be unto their God, and not profane the name of their God,—for the altar-flames of Yahweh､ the food of their God do they bring near— Therefore shall they be holy.
content_old: 6 Holy persons shall they be unto their God, and not profane the name of their God,—for the altar-flames of Yahweh､ the food of their God do they bring near— Therefore shall they be holy.

content: 7 A woman that is unchaste or dishonoured shall they not take, And a woman divorced from her husband shall they not take,— For holy he is unto his God.
content_old: 7 A woman that is unchaste or dishonoured shall they not take, And a woman divorced from her husband shall they not take,— For holy he is unto his God.

content: 8 Therefore shalt thou hold him as holy, for the food of thy God doth he bring near,— Holy shall he be to thee, For holy am I—Yahweh who am making you holy.
content_old: 8 Therefore shalt thou hold him as holy, for the food of thy God doth he bring near,— Holy shall he be to thee, For holy am I—Yahweh who am making you holy.

content: 9 And the daughter of any priest, when she profaneth herself by unchastity Her father she doth profane, with fire shall she be consumed.
content_old: 9 And the daughter of any priest, when she profaneth herself by unchastity Her father she doth profane, with fire shall she be consumed.

content: 10 And as for the high priest from among his brethren､ upon whose head is poured the anointing oil､ and who is installed, by putting on the garments His head shall he not bare, And his garments shall he not rend;
content_old: 10 And as for the high priest from among his brethren､ upon whose head is poured the anointing oil､ and who is installed, by putting on the garments His head shall he not bare, And his garments shall he not rend;

content: 11 And unto no persons of the dead shall he go in,— For his father or for his mother shall he not make himself unclean;
content_old: 11 And unto no persons of the dead shall he go in,— For his father or for his mother shall he not make himself unclean;

content: 12 And out of the sanctuary shall he not go forth, so shall he not profane the sanctuary of his God,—for the consecration of the anointing oil of his God is upon him— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 12 And out of the sanctuary shall he not go forth, so shall he not profane the sanctuary of his God,—for the consecration of the anointing oil of his God is upon him— I am Yahweh.

content: 13 But he shall take a woman, in her virginity:
content_old: 13 But he shall take a woman, in her virginity:

content: 14 A widow､ or a divorced woman､ or one dishonoured—an unchaste woman these shall he not take, But a virgin from among his own kinsfolk shall he take to wife;
content_old: 14 A widow､ or a divorced woman､ or one dishonoured—an unchaste woman these shall he not take, But a virgin from among his own kinsfolk shall he take to wife;

content: 15 So shall he not profane his seed､ among his kinsfolk,— For I—Yahweh do hallow him.
content_old: 15 So shall he not profane his seed､ among his kinsfolk,— For I—Yahweh do hallow him.

content: 16 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 16 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 17 Speak unto Aaron, saying,— No man of thy seed､ unto their generations､ in whom shall be any blemish shall come near, to present the food of his God.
content_old: 17 Speak unto Aaron, saying,— No man of thy seed､ unto their generations､ in whom shall be any blemish shall come near, to present the food of his God.

content: 18 Surely, no man in whom is any blemish shall come near,— No man who is blind or lame, or hath a flat nose､ or is lanky;
content_old: 18 Surely, no man in whom is any blemish shall come near,— No man who is blind or lame, or hath a flat nose､ or is lanky;

content: 19 nor any man who hath a broken foot,—or a broken hand;
content_old: 19 nor any man who hath a broken foot,—or a broken hand;

content: 20 or is hump-backed or a dwarf, or hath defective vision,—or hath scurvy or scab, or is crushed in the stones:
content_old: 20 or is hump-backed or a dwarf, or hath defective vision,—or hath scurvy or scab, or is crushed in the stones:

content: 21 No man in whom is a blemish､ of the seed of Aaron the priest shall approach, to bring near the altar-flames of Yahweh,—a blemish is in him, the food of his God shall he not approach to bring near:
content_old: 21 No man in whom is a blemish､ of the seed of Aaron the priest shall approach, to bring near the altar-flames of Yahweh,—a blemish is in him, the food of his God shall he not approach to bring near:

content: 22 Of the food of his God, both of the most holy,—and the holy may he eat:
content_old: 22 Of the food of his God, both of the most holy,—and the holy may he eat:

content: 23 Only unto the veil shall he not come in､ and unto the altar shall he not approach—because a blemish is in him, so shall he not profane my sanctuaries, For I—Yahweh am hallowing them.
content_old: 23 Only unto the veil shall he not come in､ and unto the altar shall he not approach—because a blemish is in him, so shall he not profane my sanctuaries, For I—Yahweh am hallowing them.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Speak unto Aaron､ and unto his-sons､ That they hold sacredly aloof from the holy things of the sons of Israel, so as not to profane my holy name,—in the things which they are hallowing unto me— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 2 Speak unto Aaron､ and unto his-sons､ That they hold sacredly aloof from the holy things of the sons of Israel, so as not to profane my holy name,—in the things which they are hallowing unto me— I am Yahweh.

content: 3 Say unto them— Unto your generations､ as touching any man who cometh near from among any of your seed､ unto the hallowed things which the sons of Israel may hallow unto Yahweh, while his uncleanness is upon him then shall that person be cut off from before me— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 3 Say unto them— Unto your generations､ as touching any man who cometh near from among any of your seed､ unto the hallowed things which the sons of Israel may hallow unto Yahweh, while his uncleanness is upon him then shall that person be cut off from before me— I am Yahweh.

content: 4 No man soever of the seed of Aaron､ who is a leper､ or hath a flux shall eat of the holy things until he be clean,— And as for him who toucheth anything that is unclean by the dead, or a man whose seed goeth from him;
content_old: 4 No man soever of the seed of Aaron､ who is a leper､ or hath a flux shall eat of the holy things until he be clean,— And as for him who toucheth anything that is unclean by the dead, or a man whose seed goeth from him;

content: 5 or a man who toucheth any creeping thing､ which is unclean to him,—or toucheth any human being who hath uncleanness, to the extent of any thing that maketh him unclean
content_old: 5 or a man who toucheth any creeping thing､ which is unclean to him,—or toucheth any human being who hath uncleanness, to the extent of any thing that maketh him unclean

content: 6 any person who toucheth any such shall then be unclean until the evening,—and shall not eat of the hallowed things, unless he bathe his flesh in water.
content_old: 6 any person who toucheth any such shall then be unclean until the evening,—and shall not eat of the hallowed things, unless he bathe his flesh in water.

content: 7 When the sun goeth in then is he clean,—and thereafter he may eat of the hallowed things, for his food it is.
content_old: 7 When the sun goeth in then is he clean,—and thereafter he may eat of the hallowed things, for his food it is.

content: 8 That which dieth of itself､ or is torn in pieces shall he not eat､ to make himself unclean thereby,— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 8 That which dieth of itself､ or is torn in pieces shall he not eat､ to make himself unclean thereby,— I am Yahweh.

content: 9 Therefore shall they keep my charge, and shall not bear､ for it､ sin, and die therein､ when they profane it,— I—Yahweh am hallowing them.
content_old: 9 Therefore shall they keep my charge, and shall not bear､ for it､ sin, and die therein､ when they profane it,— I—Yahweh am hallowing them.

content: 10 And no stranger shall eat what is hallowed,—neither one who dwelleth with a priest､ nor a hireling shall eat what is hallowed.
content_old: 10 And no stranger shall eat what is hallowed,—neither one who dwelleth with a priest､ nor a hireling shall eat what is hallowed.

content: 11 But when a priest buyeth any person､ as the purchase of his silver he may eat thereof,—and the children of his household they may eat of his food.
content_old: 11 But when a priest buyeth any person､ as the purchase of his silver he may eat thereof,—and the children of his household they may eat of his food.

content: 12 And when a priest’s daughter belongeth to a husband who is a stranger she of the heave-offering of the hallowed things may not eat.
content_old: 12 And when a priest’s daughter belongeth to a husband who is a stranger she of the heave-offering of the hallowed things may not eat.

content: 13 But when a priest’s daughter cometh to be a widow or divorced､ and hath no seed, and so she returneth unto the house of her father､ as in her youth of the food of her father she may eat,— but no stranger shall eat thereof.
content_old: 13 But when a priest’s daughter cometh to be a widow or divorced､ and hath no seed, and so she returneth unto the house of her father､ as in her youth of the food of her father she may eat,— but no stranger shall eat thereof.

content: 14 And when any man eateth what is hallowed､ by mistake then shall he add the fifth part of it thereunto, and give､ unto the priest､ the hallowed thing:
content_old: 14 And when any man eateth what is hallowed､ by mistake then shall he add the fifth part of it thereunto, and give､ unto the priest､ the hallowed thing:

content: 15 So shall they not profane the hallowed things of the sons of Israel,—which they heave up unto Yahweh;
content_old: 15 So shall they not profane the hallowed things of the sons of Israel,—which they heave up unto Yahweh;

content: 16 nor cause them to bear guilty iniquity, when they eat their hallowed things,— For I—Yahweh am hallowing them.
content_old: 16 nor cause them to bear guilty iniquity, when they eat their hallowed things,— For I—Yahweh am hallowing them.

content: 17 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 17 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 18 Speak unto Aaron､ and unto his sons､ and unto all the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them— What man soever of the house of Israel､ or of the sojourners in Israel､ may bring near his oblation､ as regardeth any of their vows, or any of their freewill offerings which they may bring near unto Yahweh､ as an ascending-sacrifice
content_old: 18 Speak unto Aaron､ and unto his sons､ and unto all the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them— What man soever of the house of Israel､ or of the sojourners in Israel､ may bring near his oblation､ as regardeth any of their vows, or any of their freewill offerings which they may bring near unto Yahweh､ as an ascending-sacrifice

content: 19 that ye may be accepted it must be a male without defect, of the beeves､ or of the sheep､ or of the goats:
content_old: 19 that ye may be accepted it must be a male without defect, of the beeves､ or of the sheep､ or of the goats:

content: 20 whatsoever hath in it a blemish shall ye not bring near,—for it shall not be accepted for you.
content_old: 20 whatsoever hath in it a blemish shall ye not bring near,—for it shall not be accepted for you.

content: 21 And whosoever would bring near a peace-offering unto Yahweh, to consecrate a vow､ or as a freewill-offering､ with a bullock or a sheep without defect shall it be､ to be accepted, no blemish shall be therein.
content_old: 21 And whosoever would bring near a peace-offering unto Yahweh, to consecrate a vow､ or as a freewill-offering､ with a bullock or a sheep without defect shall it be､ to be accepted, no blemish shall be therein.

content: 22 Blind､ or broken､ or rent､ or having a running sore､ or scurvy､ or scab ye shall not bring these near unto Yahweh,—and no altar-flame shall ye present therefrom upon the altar､ unto Yahweh.
content_old: 22 Blind､ or broken､ or rent､ or having a running sore､ or scurvy､ or scab ye shall not bring these near unto Yahweh,—and no altar-flame shall ye present therefrom upon the altar､ unto Yahweh.

content: 23 Whether an ox or a lamb､ long or short in limb as a freewill offering thou mayest offer it, but for a vow it shall not be accepted.
content_old: 23 Whether an ox or a lamb､ long or short in limb as a freewill offering thou mayest offer it, but for a vow it shall not be accepted.

content: 24 But that which is bruised in the stones､ or broken therein､ or torn or cut shall ye neither bring near unto Yahweh, nor on your own land shall ye offer.
content_old: 24 But that which is bruised in the stones､ or broken therein､ or torn or cut shall ye neither bring near unto Yahweh, nor on your own land shall ye offer.

content: 25 Even at the hand of the son of a stranger shall ye not bring near the food of your God､ of any of these,—for their damage is in them､a blemish is in them, they shall not be accepted for you.
content_old: 25 Even at the hand of the son of a stranger shall ye not bring near the food of your God､ of any of these,—for their damage is in them､a blemish is in them, they shall not be accepted for you.

content: 26 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:—
content_old: 26 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:—

content: 27 When a beeve or a sheep or a goat is brought forth then shall it be seven days under its dam,—and from the eighth day and onwards it shall be accepted as an oblation of an altar-flame､ unto Yahweh
content_old: 27 When a beeve or a sheep or a goat is brought forth then shall it be seven days under its dam,—and from the eighth day and onwards it shall be accepted as an oblation of an altar-flame､ unto Yahweh

content: 28 Whether cow or ewe—it and its young shall ye not slaughter on one day.
content_old: 28 Whether cow or ewe—it and its young shall ye not slaughter on one day.

content: 29 And when ye would offer a sacrifice of thanksgiving unto Yahweh for your acceptance shall ye offer it.
content_old: 29 And when ye would offer a sacrifice of thanksgiving unto Yahweh for your acceptance shall ye offer it.

content: 30 On the same day shall it be eaten, ye shall not leave thereof until morning,— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 30 On the same day shall it be eaten, ye shall not leave thereof until morning,— I am Yahweh.

content: 31 So then ye shall observe my commandments, and do them,— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 31 So then ye shall observe my commandments, and do them,— I am Yahweh.

content: 32 So shall ye not profane my holy name, So shall I be hallowed in the midst of the sons of Israel,—
content_old: 32 So shall ye not profane my holy name, So shall I be hallowed in the midst of the sons of Israel,—

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them, As for the appointed seasons of Yahweh, which ye shall proclaim as holy convocations these are they—my appointed seasons:—
content_old: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them, As for the appointed seasons of Yahweh, which ye shall proclaim as holy convocations these are they—my appointed seasons:—

content: 3 Six days shall work be done, but on the seventh day shall there be a sabbath of sacred rest､ a holy convocation, no work shall ye do,—a sabbath shall it be unto Yahweh, in all your dwellings.
content_old: 3 Six days shall work be done, but on the seventh day shall there be a sabbath of sacred rest､ a holy convocation, no work shall ye do,—a sabbath shall it be unto Yahweh, in all your dwellings.

content: 4 These are the appointed seasons of Yahweh, holy convocations,—which ye shall proclaim in their appointed season:—
content_old: 4 These are the appointed seasons of Yahweh, holy convocations,—which ye shall proclaim in their appointed season:—

content: 5 In the first month､ on the fourteenth of the month, between the evenings is a Passover unto Yahweh;
content_old: 5 In the first month､ on the fourteenth of the month, between the evenings is a Passover unto Yahweh;

content: 6 and on the fifteenth day of this month is the festival of unleavened cakes unto Yahweh,—seven days—unleavened cakes shall ye eat.
content_old: 6 and on the fifteenth day of this month is the festival of unleavened cakes unto Yahweh,—seven days—unleavened cakes shall ye eat.

content: 7 On the first day—a holy convocation shall there be to you: no laborious work shall ye do.
content_old: 7 On the first day—a holy convocation shall there be to you: no laborious work shall ye do.

content: 8 So then ye shall bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh､ seven days,—on the seventh day shall there be a holy convocation, no laborious work shall ye do.
content_old: 8 So then ye shall bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh､ seven days,—on the seventh day shall there be a holy convocation, no laborious work shall ye do.

content: 9 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 9 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 10 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them:— When ye enter into the land which I am giving you, and ye reap the harvest thereof then shall ye bring in a sheaf of the first-ripe corn of your harvest､ unto the priest;
content_old: 10 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them:— When ye enter into the land which I am giving you, and ye reap the harvest thereof then shall ye bring in a sheaf of the first-ripe corn of your harvest､ unto the priest;

content: 11 and he shall wave the sheaf before Yahweh､ that ye may be accepted,—on the morrow of the sabbath shall the priest wave it.
content_old: 11 and he shall wave the sheaf before Yahweh､ that ye may be accepted,—on the morrow of the sabbath shall the priest wave it.

content: 12 And ye shall offer､ on the day when ye wave the sheaf､ a he-lamb without defect､ the finest of its year､ for an ascending-sacrifice unto Yahweh;
content_old: 12 And ye shall offer､ on the day when ye wave the sheaf､ a he-lamb without defect､ the finest of its year､ for an ascending-sacrifice unto Yahweh;

content: 13 and the meal-offering thereof shall be two-tenth parts of fine meal､ overflowed with oil､ as an altar-flame unto Yahweh､ a satisfying odour,—and the drink-offering thereof shall be mine, the fourth of a hin.
content_old: 13 and the meal-offering thereof shall be two-tenth parts of fine meal､ overflowed with oil､ as an altar-flame unto Yahweh､ a satisfying odour,—and the drink-offering thereof shall be mine, the fourth of a hin.

content: 14 And neither bread､ nor roasted corn､ nor garden-land grain shall ye eat､ until this selfsame day, until ye have brought in the oblation of your God,—an age-abiding statute unto your generations, in all your dwellings.
content_old: 14 And neither bread､ nor roasted corn､ nor garden-land grain shall ye eat､ until this selfsame day, until ye have brought in the oblation of your God,—an age-abiding statute unto your generations, in all your dwellings.

content: 15 Then shall ye keep count to yourselves､ from the morrow of the sabbath, from the day ye brought in the wave sheaf,—seven sabbaths complete shall there be:
content_old: 15 Then shall ye keep count to yourselves､ from the morrow of the sabbath, from the day ye brought in the wave sheaf,—seven sabbaths complete shall there be:

content: 16 until on the morrow of the seventh sabbath ye count fifty days,—then shall ye bring near a new meal-offering unto Yahweh.
content_old: 16 until on the morrow of the seventh sabbath ye count fifty days,—then shall ye bring near a new meal-offering unto Yahweh.

content: 17 Out of your dwellings shall ye bring in two wave loaves of two-tenths of an ephah, of fine meal shall they be, with leaven shall they be baked,—first-fruits unto Yahweh.
content_old: 17 Out of your dwellings shall ye bring in two wave loaves of two-tenths of an ephah, of fine meal shall they be, with leaven shall they be baked,—first-fruits unto Yahweh.

content: 18 Then shall ye bring near､ with the bread､ seven he-lambs without defect､ of the first year, and one young bullock､ and two rams,—they shall be an ascending-sacrifice unto Yahweh, with their meal-offering､ and their drink-offerings, an altar-flame of satisfying odour unto Yahweh.
content_old: 18 Then shall ye bring near､ with the bread､ seven he-lambs without defect､ of the first year, and one young bullock､ and two rams,—they shall be an ascending-sacrifice unto Yahweh, with their meal-offering､ and their drink-offerings, an altar-flame of satisfying odour unto Yahweh.

content: 19 Then shall ye offer one he-goat､ as a sin-bearer,—and two he-lambs､ of the first year､ as a peace-offering.
content_old: 19 Then shall ye offer one he-goat､ as a sin-bearer,—and two he-lambs､ of the first year､ as a peace-offering.

content: 20 And the priest shall wave them､ with the firstfruits’ bread､ as a wave-offering before Yahweh, with the two he-lambs,—holy shall they be unto Yahweh､for the priest.
content_old: 20 And the priest shall wave them､ with the firstfruits’ bread､ as a wave-offering before Yahweh, with the two he-lambs,—holy shall they be unto Yahweh､for the priest.

content: 21 And ye shall make proclamation on this self-same day—a holy convocation shall it be unto you; no laborious work shall ye do,—an age-abiding statute､ in all your dwellings､ unto your generations.
content_old: 21 And ye shall make proclamation on this self-same day—a holy convocation shall it be unto you; no laborious work shall ye do,—an age-abiding statute､ in all your dwellings､ unto your generations.

content: 22 And when ye reap the harvest of your land thou shalt not wholly clear the border of thy field､ when thou reapest, and the gleanings of thy field shalt thou not glean,—for the poor and for the sojourner shalt thou leave them. I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 22 And when ye reap the harvest of your land thou shalt not wholly clear the border of thy field､ when thou reapest, and the gleanings of thy field shalt thou not glean,—for the poor and for the sojourner shalt thou leave them. I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 23 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 23 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 24 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying:— In the seventh month､ on the first of the month shall there be unto you a sacred rest, a trumpet-blowing commemoration､ a holy convocation:
content_old: 24 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying:— In the seventh month､ on the first of the month shall there be unto you a sacred rest, a trumpet-blowing commemoration､ a holy convocation:

content: 25 no laborious work shall ye do,—but ye shall bring､ near an altar-flame unto Yahweh.
content_old: 25 no laborious work shall ye do,—but ye shall bring､ near an altar-flame unto Yahweh.

content: 26 And Yahweh spake unto Moses, saying､
content_old: 26 And Yahweh spake unto Moses, saying､

content: 27 Surely on the tenth of this seventh month is the Day of Propitiation a holy convocation shall it be to you, therefore shall ye humble your souls,—and bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh.
content_old: 27 Surely on the tenth of this seventh month is the Day of Propitiation a holy convocation shall it be to you, therefore shall ye humble your souls,—and bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh.

content: 28 And no work shall ye do, on this selfsame day,—for a day of propitiation it is, to put a propitiatory-covering over you before Yahweh your God.
content_old: 28 And no work shall ye do, on this selfsame day,—for a day of propitiation it is, to put a propitiatory-covering over you before Yahweh your God.

content: 29 For whosoever be the person that shall not be humbled on this selfsame day then shall he be cut off from among his kinsfolk.
content_old: 29 For whosoever be the person that shall not be humbled on this selfsame day then shall he be cut off from among his kinsfolk.

content: 30 And whosoever be the person that shall do any work on this selfsame day then will I destroy that person from the midst of his people.
content_old: 30 And whosoever be the person that shall do any work on this selfsame day then will I destroy that person from the midst of his people.

content: 31 No work shall ye do,—an age-abiding statute､ to your generations, in all your dwellings.
content_old: 31 No work shall ye do,—an age-abiding statute､ to your generations, in all your dwellings.

content: 32 A sabbath of sacred rest shall it be unto you, so shall ye humble your souls,—on the ninth of the month､ in the evening, from evening to evening shall ye keep your sabbath.
content_old: 32 A sabbath of sacred rest shall it be unto you, so shall ye humble your souls,—on the ninth of the month､ in the evening, from evening to evening shall ye keep your sabbath.

content: 33 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 33 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 34 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying:— On the fifteenth day of this seventh month shall be the festival of booths､ for seven days, unto Yahweh.
content_old: 34 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying:— On the fifteenth day of this seventh month shall be the festival of booths､ for seven days, unto Yahweh.

content: 35 On the first day shall be a holy convocation,—no laborious work shall ye do.
content_old: 35 On the first day shall be a holy convocation,—no laborious work shall ye do.

content: 36 Seven days shall ye bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh: on the eighth day—a holy convocation shall there be unto you､ so shall ye bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh—the closing of the feast it is, no laborious work shall ye do.
content_old: 36 Seven days shall ye bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh: on the eighth day—a holy convocation shall there be unto you､ so shall ye bring near an altar-flame unto Yahweh—the closing of the feast it is, no laborious work shall ye do.

content: 37 These are the appointed seasons of Yahweh, which ye shall proclaim､ as holy convocations,—for bringing near､ as an altar-flame unto Yahweh､ an ascending-sacrifice､ and a meal-offering､ a sacrifice and a drink-offering､ each day’s appointment on its own day:—
content_old: 37 These are the appointed seasons of Yahweh, which ye shall proclaim､ as holy convocations,—for bringing near､ as an altar-flame unto Yahweh､ an ascending-sacrifice､ and a meal-offering､ a sacrifice and a drink-offering､ each day’s appointment on its own day:—

content: 38 besides the sabbaths of Yahweh, and besides your presents､ and besides all your vows､ and besides all your freewill offerings which ye shall give unto Yahweh.
content_old: 38 besides the sabbaths of Yahweh, and besides your presents､ and besides all your vows､ and besides all your freewill offerings which ye shall give unto Yahweh.

content: 39 Surely on the fifteenth day of the seventh month, when ye have gathered in the yield of the land shall ye celebrate the festival of Yahweh､ seven days,—on the first day a sacred rest, and on the eighth day a sacred rest.
content_old: 39 Surely on the fifteenth day of the seventh month, when ye have gathered in the yield of the land shall ye celebrate the festival of Yahweh､ seven days,—on the first day a sacred rest, and on the eighth day a sacred rest.

content: 40 So then ye shall take you､ on the first day､ boughs of goodly trees､ branches of palm-trees, and boughs of thick trees, and poplars of the ravine,—and shall rejoice before Yahweh your God､ seven days.
content_old: 40 So then ye shall take you､ on the first day､ boughs of goodly trees､ branches of palm-trees, and boughs of thick trees, and poplars of the ravine,—and shall rejoice before Yahweh your God､ seven days.

content: 41 So shall ye celebrate it as a festival unto Yahweh, seven days in the year,—a statute age-abiding､ to your generations. In the seventh month shall ye celebrate it;
content_old: 41 So shall ye celebrate it as a festival unto Yahweh, seven days in the year,—a statute age-abiding､ to your generations. In the seventh month shall ye celebrate it;

content: 42 In booths shall ye dwell seven days;— All the home-born in Israel shall dwell in booths:
content_old: 42 In booths shall ye dwell seven days;— All the home-born in Israel shall dwell in booths:

content: 43 To the end that your generations may know, that in booths made I the sons of Israel to dwell, when I brought them forth out of the land of Egypt,— I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 43 To the end that your generations may know, that in booths made I the sons of Israel to dwell, when I brought them forth out of the land of Egypt,— I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Command the sons of Israel､ That they bring unto thee—pure oil olive､ beaten､ for giving light,—to cause the lamp to burn up continually.
content_old: 2 Command the sons of Israel､ That they bring unto thee—pure oil olive､ beaten､ for giving light,—to cause the lamp to burn up continually.

content: 3 Outside the veil of the testimony､ in the tent of meeting shall Aaron order it､ from evening until morning､ before Yahweh､ continually,—a statute age-abiding､ to your generations.
content_old: 3 Outside the veil of the testimony､ in the tent of meeting shall Aaron order it､ from evening until morning､ before Yahweh､ continually,—a statute age-abiding､ to your generations.

content: 4 Upon the pure lampstand shall he order the lamps,—before Yahweh､ continually.
content_old: 4 Upon the pure lampstand shall he order the lamps,—before Yahweh､ continually.

content: 5 And thou shalt take fine meal, and bake it, in twelve cakes,—of two-tenths shall each cake be.
content_old: 5 And thou shalt take fine meal, and bake it, in twelve cakes,—of two-tenths shall each cake be.

content: 6 And thou shalt set them in two rows､ six in a row,—upon the pure table､ before Yahweh.
content_old: 6 And thou shalt set them in two rows､ six in a row,—upon the pure table､ before Yahweh.

content: 7 And thou shalt put､ upon each row､ pure frankincense,—so shall it belong unto the bread as a memorial, an altar-flame unto Yahweh.
content_old: 7 And thou shalt put､ upon each row､ pure frankincense,—so shall it belong unto the bread as a memorial, an altar-flame unto Yahweh.

content: 8 Sabbath day by sabbath day shall he order it､ before Yahweh､ continually,—from the sons of Israel､ as an age-abiding covenant:
content_old: 8 Sabbath day by sabbath day shall he order it､ before Yahweh､ continually,—from the sons of Israel､ as an age-abiding covenant:

content: 9 so shall it be for Aaron and for his sons, and they shall eat it､ in a holy place,—for most holy shall it be unto him､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh､ a statute age-abiding.
content_old: 9 so shall it be for Aaron and for his sons, and they shall eat it､ in a holy place,—for most holy shall it be unto him､ from among the altar-flames of Yahweh､ a statute age-abiding.

content: 10 And forth went the son of a woman of Israel—he being the son of a man of Egypt—in the midst of the sons of Israel;
content_old: 10 And forth went the son of a woman of Israel—he being the son of a man of Egypt—in the midst of the sons of Israel;

content: 11 and the son of the woman of Israel, and a man of Israel, reviled one another in the camp. And the son of the Israelitish woman uttered contemptuously the Name､ and reviled. So they brought him in unto Moses,—now the name of his mother was Shelomith､ daughter of Dibri､ of the tribe of Dan;
content_old: 11 and the son of the woman of Israel, and a man of Israel, reviled one another in the camp. And the son of the Israelitish woman uttered contemptuously the Name､ and reviled.
