content: 12 and they put him in ward,—that a clear answer might be given to them､ at the mouth of Yahweh.
content_old: 12 and they put him in ward,—that a clear answer might be given to them､ at the mouth of Yahweh.

content: 13 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 13 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying:

content: 14 Bring forth him that reviled､ unto the outside of the camp, then shall all that heard him lean their hands upon his head,—and all the assembly shall stone him.
content_old: 14 Bring forth him that reviled､ unto the outside of the camp, then shall all that heard him lean their hands upon his head,—and all the assembly shall stone him.

content: 15 And unto the sons of Israel shalt thou speak��� saying,— What man soever curseth his God shall bear his sin.
content_old: 15 And unto the sons of Israel shalt thou speak��� saying,— What man soever curseth his God shall bear his sin.

content: 16 And he that contemptuously uttereth the name of Yahweh shall be surely put to death, all the assembly shall surely stone him,—as the sojourner､ so the home-born when he contemptuously､ uttereth the Name he shall be put to death.
content_old: 16 And he that contemptuously uttereth the name of Yahweh shall be surely put to death, all the assembly shall surely stone him,—as the sojourner､ so the home-born when he contemptuously､ uttereth the Name he shall be put to death.

content: 17 And when any man by smiting taketh the life of any human being he shall be surely put to death.
content_old: 17 And when any man by smiting taketh the life of any human being he shall be surely put to death.

content: 18 And he that by smiting taketh away the life of a beast shall make it good,—life for life.
content_old: 18 And he that by smiting taketh away the life of a beast shall make it good,—life for life.

content: 19 And when any man inflicteth a blemish upon his neighbour as he hath done, so shall it be done to him:
content_old: 19 And when any man inflicteth a blemish upon his neighbour as he hath done, so shall it be done to him:

content: 20 fracture for fracture, eye for eye, tooth for tooth as he inflicteth a blemish upon a human being so shall one be inflicted upon him.
content_old: 20 fracture for fracture, eye for eye, tooth for tooth as he inflicteth a blemish upon a human being so shall one be inflicted upon him.

content: 21 And he that killeth a beast shall make it good,—and he that killeth a human being shall be put to death.
content_old: 21 And he that killeth a beast shall make it good,—and he that killeth a human being shall be put to death.

content: 22 One rule shall ye have, as the sojourner so the home-born shall be,— For I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 22 One rule shall ye have, as the sojourner so the home-born shall be,— For I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses in Mount Sinai､ saying—
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses in Mount Sinai､ saying—

content: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them:— When ye enter into the land which I am giving you then shall the land keep a sabbath unto Yahweh.
content_old: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them:— When ye enter into the land which I am giving you then shall the land keep a sabbath unto Yahweh.

content: 3 Six years shalt thou sow thy field, and six years shalt thou prune thy vineyard,—and gather the increase thereof;
content_old: 3 Six years shalt thou sow thy field, and six years shalt thou prune thy vineyard,—and gather the increase thereof;

content: 4 but in the seventh year—a sabbath of sacred rest shall there be unto the land, a sabbath unto Yahweh: thy field shalt thou not sow, and thy vineyard shalt thou not prune;
content_old: 4 but in the seventh year—a sabbath of sacred rest shall there be unto the land, a sabbath unto Yahweh: thy field shalt thou not sow, and thy vineyard shalt thou not prune;

content: 5 that which groweth of itself of thy harvest shalt thou not reap; and the grapes of thine unpruned vines shalt thou not cut off: a year of sacred rest shall there be to the land.
content_old: 5 that which groweth of itself of thy harvest shalt thou not reap; and the grapes of thine unpruned vines shalt thou not cut off: a year of sacred rest shall there be to the land.

content: 6 So shall the sabbath of the land be unto you for food: unto thee､ and unto thy servant and unto thy handmaid,—and unto thy hireling､ and unto thy settlers that are sojourning with thee;
content_old: 6 So shall the sabbath of the land be unto you for food: unto thee､ and unto thy servant and unto thy handmaid,—and unto thy hireling､ and unto thy settlers that are sojourning with thee;

content: 7 and unto thy tame-beasts, and unto the wild-beasts that are in thy land shall belong all the increase thereof､ for food.
content_old: 7 and unto thy tame-beasts, and unto the wild-beasts that are in thy land shall belong all the increase thereof､ for food.

content: 8 And thou shalt count to thee seven weeks of years, seven years､ seven times,—so shall the days of the seven weeks of years become to thee､ forty-nine years.
content_old: 8 And thou shalt count to thee seven weeks of years, seven years､ seven times,—so shall the days of the seven weeks of years become to thee､ forty-nine years.

content: 9 Then shalt thou cause a signal-horn to pass through､ in the seventh month, on the tenth of the month: on the Day of Propitiation shall ye cause a horn to pass throughout all your land.
content_old: 9 Then shalt thou cause a signal-horn to pass through､ in the seventh month, on the tenth of the month: on the Day of Propitiation shall ye cause a horn to pass throughout all your land.

content: 10 So shall ye hallow the fiftieth year, and proclaim freedom throughout the land､ to all the dwellers thereof,—a jubilee shall it be unto you, and ye shall return､ every man unto his possession, and every man､ unto his family shall ye return.
content_old: 10 So shall ye hallow the fiftieth year, and proclaim freedom throughout the land､ to all the dwellers thereof,—a jubilee shall it be unto you, and ye shall return､ every man unto his possession, and every man､ unto his family shall ye return.

content: 11 A jubilee shall that fiftieth year be unto you,—ye shall not sow, neither shall ye reap the self-grown corn thereof, nor cut off the grapes of the unpruned vines thereof.
content_old: 11 A jubilee shall that fiftieth year be unto you,—ye shall not sow, neither shall ye reap the self-grown corn thereof, nor cut off the grapes of the unpruned vines thereof.

content: 12 For a jubilee it is, holy shall it be unto you,—out of the field shall ye eat her increase.
content_old: 12 For a jubilee it is, holy shall it be unto you,—out of the field shall ye eat her increase.

content: 13 In this same jubilee year shall ye return､ every man unto his possession.
content_old: 13 In this same jubilee year shall ye return､ every man unto his possession.

content: 14 And when ye sell anything to thy neighbour, or buy aught at thy neighbour’s hand do not overreach one another. By
content_old: 14 And when ye sell anything to thy neighbour, or buy aught at thy neighbour’s hand do not overreach one another. By

content: 15 the number of years after the jubilee shalt thou buy of thy neighbour,—by the number of the years of increase shall he sell unto thee;
content_old: 15 the number of years after the jubilee shalt thou buy of thy neighbour,—by the number of the years of increase shall he sell unto thee;

content: 16 according to the multitude of the years shalt thou increase the price thereof, and according to the fewness of the years shalt thou diminish the price thereof,—because the sum of the increase it is that he selleth thee.
content_old: 16 according to the multitude of the years shalt thou increase the price thereof, and according to the fewness of the years shalt thou diminish the price thereof,—because the sum of the increase it is that he selleth thee.

content: 17 So then ye shall not overreach one another; but thou shalt stand in awe of thy God,—for I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 17 So then ye shall not overreach one another; but thou shalt stand in awe of thy God,—for I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 18 Wherefore ye shall do my statutes, and my regulations shall ye observe､ and do them,—so shall ye dwell upon the land with confidence;
content_old: 18 Wherefore ye shall do my statutes, and my regulations shall ye observe､ and do them,—so shall ye dwell upon the land with confidence;

content: 19 and the land shall yield her fruit; and ye shall eat to the full,—and shall dwell with confidence thereupon.
content_old: 19 and the land shall yield her fruit; and ye shall eat to the full,—and shall dwell with confidence thereupon.

content: 20 And since ye may say､ What shall we eat in the seventh year? Lo! we are not to sow, neither are we to gather our increase!
content_old: 20 And since ye may say､ What shall we eat in the seventh year? Lo! we are not to sow, neither are we to gather our increase!

content: 21 Therefore will I command my blessing upon you､ in the sixth year,—and it shall make the increase of three years;
content_old: 21 Therefore will I command my blessing upon you､ in the sixth year,—and it shall make the increase of three years;

content: 22 and ye shall sow､ the eighth year, and eat of old store,—until the ninth year､ until the coming in of the increase thereof shall ye eat old store.
content_old: 22 and ye shall sow､ the eighth year, and eat of old store,—until the ninth year､ until the coming in of the increase thereof shall ye eat old store.

content: 23 The land moreover､ shall not be sold beyond recovery, for mine is the land,—for sojourners and settlers ye are with me.
content_old: 23 The land moreover､ shall not be sold beyond recovery, for mine is the land,—for sojourners and settlers ye are with me.

content: 24 And in all the land of your possession a right of redemption shall ye give to the land.
content_old: 24 And in all the land of your possession a right of redemption shall ye give to the land.

content: 25 When thy brother waxeth poor, and so selleth aught of his possession then may his kinsman that is near unto him come in, and redeem that which was sold by his brother.
content_old: 25 When thy brother waxeth poor, and so selleth aught of his possession then may his kinsman that is near unto him come in, and redeem that which was sold by his brother.

content: 26 And when any man hath no kinsman,—but his own hand getteth enough, so that he findeth what is needed to redeem it
content_old: 26 And when any man hath no kinsman,—but his own hand getteth enough, so that he findeth what is needed to redeem it

content: 27 then shall he reckon the years since he sold it, and restore the overplus､ to the man to whom he sold it,—and shall return to his possession.
content_old: 27 then shall he reckon the years since he sold it, and restore the overplus､ to the man to whom he sold it,—and shall return to his possession.

content: 28 But if his hand have not found enough to get it back unto him then shall that which he sold remain in the hand of him that bought it､ until the year of the jubilee,—and shall go out in the jubilee, and he shall return unto his possession.
content_old: 28 But if his hand have not found enough to get it back unto him then shall that which he sold remain in the hand of him that bought it､ until the year of the jubilee,—and shall go out in the jubilee, and he shall return unto his possession.

content: 29 And when any man selleth a dwelling-house in a walled city then shall his right of redemption remain､ until the completion of a year after he sold it,—for a year of days shall his right of redemption remain.
content_old: 29 And when any man selleth a dwelling-house in a walled city then shall his right of redemption remain､ until the completion of a year after he sold it,—for a year of days shall his right of redemption remain.

content: 30 But if it be not redeemed before the end of a full year then shall the house that is in the city that hath walls be confirmed beyond recovery､ to him who bought it､ unto his generations,—it shall not go out in the jubilee.
content_old: 30 But if it be not redeemed before the end of a full year then shall the house that is in the city that hath walls be confirmed beyond recovery､ to him who bought it､ unto his generations,—it shall not go out in the jubilee.

content: 31 But as for the houses of villages which have no wall round about them with the fields of land shall it be reckoned,—a right of redemption shall belong to it, and in the jubilee shall it go out.
content_old: 31 But as for the houses of villages which have no wall round about them with the fields of land shall it be reckoned,—a right of redemption shall belong to it, and in the jubilee shall it go out.

content: 32 And as for the cities of the Levites, the houses of the cities of their possession an age-abiding right of redemption shall pertain unto the Levites.
content_old: 32 And as for the cities of the Levites, the houses of the cities of their possession an age-abiding right of redemption shall pertain unto the Levites.

content: 33 And if one of the Levites should not redeem then shall the sale of the house and the city of his possession go out in the jubilee; for the houses of the cities of the Levites are their possession, in the midst of the sons of Israel.
content_old: 33 And if one of the Levites should not redeem then shall the sale of the house and the city of his possession go out in the jubilee; for the houses of the cities of the Levites are their possession, in the midst of the sons of Israel.

content: 34 But the field of the pastureland of their cities shall not be sold,—for an age-abiding possession it is unto them.
content_old: 34 But the field of the pastureland of their cities shall not be sold,—for an age-abiding possession it is unto them.

content: 35 And when thy brother waxeth poor, and his hand becometh feeble with thee then shalt thou strengthen him, as a sojourner and a settler so shall he live with thee.
content_old: 35 And when thy brother waxeth poor, and his hand becometh feeble with thee then shalt thou strengthen him, as a sojourner and a settler so shall he live with thee.

content: 36 Do not accept from him interest or profit, but stand thou in awe of thy God,—so shall thy brother live with thee.
content_old: 36 Do not accept from him interest or profit, but stand thou in awe of thy God,—so shall thy brother live with thee.

content: 37 Thy silver shalt thou not give him on interest,—neither for profit shalt thou give him thy food.
content_old: 37 Thy silver shalt thou not give him on interest,—neither for profit shalt thou give him thy food.

content: 38 I—Yahweh am your God, who brought you forth out of the land of Egypt,—to give unto you the land of Canaan, to become your God
content_old: 38 I—Yahweh am your God, who brought you forth out of the land of Egypt,—to give unto you the land of Canaan, to become your God

content: 39 And when thy brother waxeth poor with thee､ and so selleth himself unto thee thou shalt not bind him with the bondage of a bondman:
content_old: 39 And when thy brother waxeth poor with thee､ and so selleth himself unto thee thou shalt not bind him with the bondage of a bondman:

content: 40 as a hired servant, as a settler shall he remain with thee,—until the year of the jubilee shall he serve with thee:
content_old: 40 as a hired servant, as a settler shall he remain with thee,—until the year of the jubilee shall he serve with thee:

content: 41 then shall he go forth from thee, he and his sons with him,—and shall return unto his family, and unto the possession of his fathers shall he return.
content_old: 41 then shall he go forth from thee, he and his sons with him,—and shall return unto his family, and unto the possession of his fathers shall he return.

content: 42 For my bondmen they are, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt,—they shall not sell themselves with the sale of a bondman.
content_old: 42 For my bondmen they are, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt,—they shall not sell themselves with the sale of a bondman.

content: 43 Thou shalt not rule over him with rigour,—so shalt thou stand in awe of thy God.
content_old: 43 Thou shalt not rule over him with rigour,—so shalt thou stand in awe of thy God.

content: 44 And as for thy bondman and thy bondmaid which thou shalt have of the nations that are round about you—from them may ye buy bondman and bondmaid.
content_old: 44 And as for thy bondman and thy bondmaid which thou shalt have of the nations that are round about you—from them may ye buy bondman and bondmaid.

content: 45 Moreover also, of the sons of the settlers who are sojourning with you—of them may ye buy, and of their families that are with you､ which they have begotten in your land,—so shall they become yours､ as a possession;
content_old: 45 Moreover also, of the sons of the settlers who are sojourning with you—of them may ye buy, and of their families that are with you､ which they have begotten in your land,—so shall they become yours､ as a possession;

content: 46 and ye may take them as an inheritance､ for your sons after you､ to inherit as a possession, unto times age-abiding of them may ye take to be bondmen,—but over your brethren the sons of Israel—a man over his brother ye shall not rule over him with rigour.
content_old: 46 and ye may take them as an inheritance､ for your sons after you､ to inherit as a possession, unto times age-abiding of them may ye take to be bondmen,—but over your brethren the sons of Israel—a man over his brother ye shall not rule over him with rigour.

content: 47 And when the hand of the sojourner and settler with thee getteth possessions, and thy brother with him waxeth poor,—and so he selleth himself to the sojourner､ who is a settler with thee, or to one who hath taken root､ of the family of the sojourner
content_old: 47 And when the hand of the sojourner and settler with thee getteth possessions, and thy brother with him waxeth poor,—and so he selleth himself to the sojourner､ who is a settler with thee, or to one who hath taken root､ of the family of the sojourner

content: 48 after that he hath sold himself a right of redemption pertaineth to him,—one of his brethren may redeem him;
content_old: 48 after that he hath sold himself a right of redemption pertaineth to him,—one of his brethren may redeem him;

content: 49 or his uncle､ or his uncle’s son may redeem him, or a near flesh-relation of his､ of his family may redeem him,—or his own hand may have gotten enough and so he may redeem himself.
content_old: 49 or his uncle､ or his uncle’s son may redeem him, or a near flesh-relation of his､ of his family may redeem him,—or his own hand may have gotten enough and so he may redeem himself.

content: 50 Then shall he reckon with him that bought him, from the year that he was sold to him, unto the year of the jubilee,—and the silver for which he was sold shall be by the number of years, according to the days of a hired servant shall he be with him.
content_old: 50 Then shall he reckon with him that bought him, from the year that he was sold to him, unto the year of the jubilee,—and the silver for which he was sold shall be by the number of years, according to the days of a hired servant shall he be with him.

content: 51 If there is yet a multitude of years according to them shall he return､ as his redemption price､ of the silver of him that bought him.
content_old: 51 If there is yet a multitude of years according to them shall he return､ as his redemption price､ of the silver of him that bought him.

content: 52 Or if there is but a small remainder of years, until the year of the jubilee then shall he reckon to himself,—according to the years thereof shall he return his price of redemption.
content_old: 52 Or if there is but a small remainder of years, until the year of the jubilee then shall he reckon to himself,—according to the years thereof shall he return his price of redemption.

content: 53 As a servant hired year by year shall he be with him,—he shall not rule over him with rigour､ before thine eyes.
content_old: 53 As a servant hired year by year shall he be with him,—he shall not rule over him with rigour､ before thine eyes.

content: 54 But if he be not redeemed in any of these ways then shall he go out in the jubilee year, he､ and his sons with him.
content_old: 54 But if he be not redeemed in any of these ways then shall he go out in the jubilee year, he､ and his sons with him.

content: 1 Ye shall not make unto you idols,—neither image､ nor pillar shall ye set up for yourselves, nor sculptured stone shall ye place in your land, to bow yourselves down thereunto,— For I—Yahweh am your God.
content_old: 1 Ye shall not make unto you idols,—neither image､ nor pillar shall ye set up for yourselves, nor sculptured stone shall ye place in your land, to bow yourselves down thereunto,— For I—Yahweh am your God.

content: 2 My sabbaths shall ye observe, And my sanctuary shall ye revere,— I am Yahweh.
content_old: 2 My sabbaths shall ye observe, And my sanctuary shall ye revere,— I am Yahweh.

content: 3 If in my statutes ye will walk,— And my commandments ye will observe, and do them
content_old: 3 If in my statutes ye will walk,— And my commandments ye will observe, and do them

content: 4 Then will I give your rains in their season,— And the land shall yield her increase, And the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.
content_old: 4 Then will I give your rains in their season,— And the land shall yield her increase, And the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.

content: 5 Then shall your threshing reach unto the vintage, And the vintage shall reach unto the seedtime,— And ye shall eat your food to the full, And shall dwell securely in your land.
content_old: 5 Then shall your threshing reach unto the vintage, And the vintage shall reach unto the seedtime,— And ye shall eat your food to the full, And shall dwell securely in your land.

content: 6 And I will give peace in the land, And ye shall lie down､ and nothing shall make you afraid; And I will take away vicious beasts out of the land; And the sword shall not go through your land.
content_old: 6 And I will give peace in the land, And ye shall lie down､ and nothing shall make you afraid; And I will take away vicious beasts out of the land; And the sword shall not go through your land.

content: 7 And ye shall chase your foes,— And they shall fall before you､ by the sword;
content_old: 7 And ye shall chase your foes,— And they shall fall before you､ by the sword;

content: 8 And five of you shall chase a hundred And a hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight,— So shall your foes fall before you､ by the sword.
content_old: 8 And five of you shall chase a hundred And a hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight,— So shall your foes fall before you､ by the sword.

content: 9 And I will turn unto you, And make you fruitful,— And multiply you, And will establish my covenant with you.
content_old: 9 And I will turn unto you, And make you fruitful,— And multiply you, And will establish my covenant with you.

content: 10 And ye shall eat old store､ well seasoned,—And the old from before the new shall ye put forth.
content_old: 10 And ye shall eat old store､ well seasoned,—And the old from before the new shall ye put forth.

content: 11 And I will set my habitation in your midst,— And my soul shall not abhor you;
content_old: 11 And I will set my habitation in your midst,— And my soul shall not abhor you;

content: 12 But I will walk to and fro in your midst, And will be unto you a God,— And ye shall be unto me a people.
content_old: 12 But I will walk to and fro in your midst, And will be unto you a God,— And ye shall be unto me a people.

content: 13 l—Yahweh am your God､ who brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; so I brake in pieces the staves of your yoke, and caused you to walk erect.
content_old: 13 l—Yahweh am your God､ who brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; so I brake in pieces the staves of your yoke, and caused you to walk erect.

content: 14 But if ye will not hearken unto me, And will not do all these commandments;
content_old: 14 But if ye will not hearken unto me, And will not do all these commandments;

content: 15 And if my statutes ye refuse, And my regulations your souls shall abhor,— So that ye will not do all my commandments, But shall break my covenant
content_old: 15 And if my statutes ye refuse, And my regulations your souls shall abhor,— So that ye will not do all my commandments, But shall break my covenant

content: 16 I also will do this unto you— I will set over you for terror consumption and fever, Causing the eyes to fail､ and the soul to pine away,— And ye shall sow､ in vain､ your seed, for it shall be eaten by your foes.
content_old: 16 I also will do this unto you— I will set over you for terror consumption and fever, Causing the eyes to fail､ and the soul to pine away,— And ye shall sow､ in vain､ your seed, for it shall be eaten by your foes.

content: 17 And I will set my face against you, And ye shall be smitten before your foes,— And be trodden down by them who hate you, And shall flee､ when no one is pursuing you.
content_old: 17 And I will set my face against you, And ye shall be smitten before your foes,— And be trodden down by them who hate you, And shall flee､ when no one is pursuing you.

content: 18 And if even with these things ye will not hearken unto me Then will I yet further correct you､ seven times､ for your sins.
content_old: 18 And if even with these things ye will not hearken unto me Then will I yet further correct you､ seven times､ for your sins.

content: 19 So will I break your pomp of power, And will set your heavens as iron, and your land as bronze;
content_old: 19 So will I break your pomp of power, And will set your heavens as iron, and your land as bronze;

content: 20 And your strength shall be spent in vain,—And your land shall not yield her increase, And the trees of the land shall not yield their fruit.
content_old: 20 And your strength shall be spent in vain,—And your land shall not yield her increase, And the trees of the land shall not yield their fruit.

content: 21 If､ therefore､ ye will go in opposition to me, And not be willing to hearken unto me Then will I yet further plague you seven times､ according to your sins;
content_old: 21 If､ therefore､ ye will go in opposition to me, And not be willing to hearken unto me Then will I yet further plague you seven times､ according to your sins;

content: 22 And will send among you the wild-beast of the field､ And it shall rob you of your children, And cut off your cattle, And make you few in number; And your roads shall be silent.
content_old: 22 And will send among you the wild-beast of the field､ And it shall rob you of your children, And cut off your cattle, And make you few in number; And your roads shall be silent.

content: 23 And if by these things ye will not be corrected by me,— But will go in opposition to me
content_old: 23 And if by these things ye will not be corrected by me,— But will go in opposition to me

content: 24 Then will I also go in opposition to you And I even I will plague you seven times､ for your sins;
content_old: 24 Then will I also go in opposition to you And I even I will plague you seven times､ for your sins;

content: 25 And will bring in upon you a sword､ that shall inflict the covenanted avenging: So shall ye be gathered into your cities,— Then will I send a pestilence into your midst, And ye shall be delivered into the hand of an enemy.
content_old: 25 And will bring in upon you a sword､ that shall inflict the covenanted avenging: So shall ye be gathered into your cities,— Then will I send a pestilence into your midst, And ye shall be delivered into the hand of an enemy.

content: 26 When I have broken your staff of bread then shall ten women bake your bread in one oven, And give back your bread by weight,— And ye shall eat､ and not be filled.
content_old: 26 When I have broken your staff of bread then shall ten women bake your bread in one oven, And give back your bread by weight,— And ye shall eat､ and not be filled.

content: 27 And if with this､ ye will not hearken to me,— But will go in opposition to me
content_old: 27 And if with this､ ye will not hearken to me,— But will go in opposition to me

content: 28 Then will I go in a rage of opposition to you,— And I even I will correct you seven times､ for your sins;
content_old: 28 Then will I go in a rage of opposition to you,— And I even I will correct you seven times､ for your sins;

content: 29 And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons,— Yea even the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.
content_old: 29 And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons,— Yea even the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.

content: 30 And I will destroy your high places､ And cut down your sun-pillars, And cast your carcases upon the carcases of your manufactured gods,— Thus shall my soul abhor you.
content_old: 30 And I will destroy your high places､ And cut down your sun-pillars, And cast your carcases upon the carcases of your manufactured gods,— Thus shall my soul abhor you.

content: 31 And I will give your cities unto desolation, And make your holy places dumb,— And will find no fragrance in your satisfying odour;
content_old: 31 And I will give your cities unto desolation, And make your holy places dumb,— And will find no fragrance in your satisfying odour;

content: 32 And l will make the land dumb, And your foes that dwell therein shall regard it with dumb amazement:
content_old: 32 And l will make the land dumb, And your foes that dwell therein shall regard it with dumb amazement:

content: 33 When even you I scatter among the nations, And make bare､ after you､ a sword Then shall your land become an astonishment, And your cities become a desolation.
content_old: 33 When even you I scatter among the nations, And make bare､ after you､ a sword Then shall your land become an astonishment, And your cities become a desolation.

content: 34 Then shall the land be paid her sabbaths､ All the days she lieth desolate, While ye are in the land of your foes,— Then shall the land keep sabbath, And pay off her sabbaths:
content_old: 34 Then shall the land be paid her sabbaths､ All the days she lieth desolate, While ye are in the land of your foes,— Then shall the land keep sabbath, And pay off her sabbaths:

content: 35 All the days she lieth desolate shall she keep sabbath,—the which she kept not as your sabbaths, while ye dwelt thereupon.
content_old: 35 All the days she lieth desolate shall she keep sabbath,—the which she kept not as your sabbaths, while ye dwelt thereupon.

content: 36 And as for such as are left of you Then will I bring faintness into their heart, in the lands of their foes,— So that the sound of a driven leaf shall chase them, And they shall flee as though fleeing from a sword､ And they shall fall､ when no one is pursuing;
content_old: 36 And as for such as are left of you Then will I bring faintness into their heart, in the lands of their foes,— So that the sound of a driven leaf shall chase them, And they shall flee as though fleeing from a sword､ And they shall fall､ when no one is pursuing;

content: 37 And they shall stumble one upon another､ as from before a sword､ when pursuer there is none; And ye shall not have wherewith to stand before your foes;
content_old: 37 And they shall stumble one upon another､ as from before a sword､ when pursuer there is none; And ye shall not have wherewith to stand before your foes;

content: 38 And ye shall perish among the nations,— And the land of your foes shall eat you up;
content_old: 38 And ye shall perish among the nations,— And the land of your foes shall eat you up;

content: 39 And they who are left of you shall melt away in their iniquity, in the lands of your foes; Yea also in the iniquity of their fathers with them shall they melt away.
content_old: 39 And they who are left of you shall melt away in their iniquity, in the lands of your foes; Yea also in the iniquity of their fathers with them shall they melt away.

content: 40 Then shall they confess their iniquity､ And the iniquity of their fathers, In their unfaithfulness wherewith they had been unfaithful towards me; Yea moreover because they had gone in opposition to me
content_old: 40 Then shall they confess their iniquity､ And the iniquity of their fathers, In their unfaithfulness wherewith they had been unfaithful towards me; Yea moreover because they had gone in opposition to me

content: 41 I also must needs go in opposition to them, and bring them into the land of their foes,— Save only that if even then their uncircumcised heart shall be humbled, And even then they shall accept as a payment the punishment of their iniquity
content_old: 41 I also must needs go in opposition to them, and bring them into the land of their foes,— Save only that if even then their uncircumcised heart shall be humbled, And even then they shall accept as a payment the punishment of their iniquity

content: 42 Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob､ Yea moreover my covenant with Isaac Yea moreover my covenant with Abraham will I remember; And the land will I remember.
content_old: 42 Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob､ Yea moreover my covenant with Isaac Yea moreover my covenant with Abraham will I remember; And the land will I remember.

content: 43 For the land shall be left of them､ And shall be paid her sabbaths､ while she lieth desolate without them, They also accepting as a payment the punishment of their iniquity, Because, yea because my regulations they refused, And my statutes their soul abhorred.
content_old: 43 For the land shall be left of them､ And shall be paid her sabbaths､ while she lieth desolate without them, They also accepting as a payment the punishment of their iniquity, Because, yea because my regulations they refused, And my statutes their soul abhorred.

content: 44 And yet even so､ when they are in the land of their foes I have not refused them､ Neither have I abhorred them､ To make an end of them, To break my covenant with them,— For I—Yahweh am their God.
content_old: 44 And yet even so､ when they are in the land of their foes I have not refused them､ Neither have I abhorred them､ To make an end of them, To break my covenant with them,— For I—Yahweh am their God.

content: 45 Therefore will I remember in their behalf､ the covenant of their ancestors,— Whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt､ in the sight of the nations､ that I might be their God— I—Yahweh.
content_old: 45 Therefore will I remember in their behalf､ the covenant of their ancestors,— Whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt､ in the sight of the nations､ that I might be their God— I—Yahweh.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them— When any man would consecrate and pay a vow by thine estimate of lives unto Yahweh
content_old: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ and thou shalt say unto them— When any man would consecrate and pay a vow by thine estimate of lives unto Yahweh

content: 3 then shall thine estimate be for the male from twenty years of age even to sixty years of age yea thine estimate shall be—fifty shekels of silver､ by the shekel of the sanctuary;
content_old: 3 then shall thine estimate be for the male from twenty years of age even to sixty years of age yea thine estimate shall be—fifty shekels of silver､ by the shekel of the sanctuary;

content: 4 but if it be a female then shall thine estimate be､ thirty shekels.
content_old: 4 but if it be a female then shall thine estimate be､ thirty shekels.

content: 5 And if it be from five years of age､ even unto twenty years of age then shall thine estimate be for the male twenty shekels,—and for the female ten shekels.
content_old: 5 And if it be from five years of age､ even unto twenty years of age then shall thine estimate be for the male twenty shekels,—and for the female ten shekels.

content: 6 And､if it be from a month old､ even unto five years old then shall thine estimate be—for the male five shekels of silver,—and for the female thine estimate shall be three shekels of silver.
content_old: 6 And､if it be from a month old､ even unto five years old then shall thine estimate be—for the male five shekels of silver,—and for the female thine estimate shall be three shekels of silver.

content: 7 And if it be from sixty years of age and upwards if a male then shall thine estimate be fifteen shekels,—and for the female ten shekels.
content_old: 7 And if it be from sixty years of age and upwards if a male then shall thine estimate be fifteen shekels,—and for the female ten shekels.

content: 8 But if he be too poor for thine estimate then shall he present himself before the priest, and the priest shall estimate him,—according to that which the hand of him who would vow can attain to shall the priest estimate him.
content_old: 8 But if he be too poor for thine estimate then shall he present himself before the priest, and the priest shall estimate him,—according to that which the hand of him who would vow can attain to shall the priest estimate him.

content: 9 And if it be a beast where of men may bring near an oblation unto Yahweh all that whereof aught is given to Yahweh shall be holy.
content_old: 9 And if it be a beast where of men may bring near an oblation unto Yahweh all that whereof aught is given to Yahweh shall be holy.

content: 10 He shall not alter it､ nor change it､—good for bad､ or bad for good,—but if he do change beast for beast then shall both it and what was given in exchange for it be holy.
content_old: 10 He shall not alter it､ nor change it､—good for bad､ or bad for good,—but if he do change beast for beast then shall both it and what was given in exchange for it be holy.

content: 11 And if it be any unclean beast､ whereof men may not bring near an oblation toYahweh then shall he present the beast before the priest:
content_old: 11 And if it be any unclean beast､ whereof men may not bring near an oblation toYahweh then shall he present the beast before the priest:

content: 12 and the priest shall estimate it, whether it is good or bad,—according to thine estimate､ O priest so shall it be.
content_old: 12 and the priest shall estimate it, whether it is good or bad,—according to thine estimate､ O priest so shall it be.

content: 13 But if he should please to redeem it then shall he add the fifth part thereof unto thine estimate.
content_old: 13 But if he should please to redeem it then shall he add the fifth part thereof unto thine estimate.

content: 14 And when any man would hallow his house to be holy unto Yahweh then shall the priest estimate it, whether it is good or bad,—as the priest shall estimate it so shall it stand.
content_old: 14 And when any man would hallow his house to be holy unto Yahweh then shall the priest estimate it, whether it is good or bad,—as the priest shall estimate it so shall it stand.

content: 15 But if he that halloweth it would redeem his house then shall he add the fifth part of the silver of thine estimate thereunto､ and it shall be his.
content_old: 15 But if he that halloweth it would redeem his house then shall he add the fifth part of the silver of thine estimate thereunto､ and it shall be his.

content: 16 And if of the field of his possession any man would hallow unto Yahweh then shall thine estimate be according to the seed thereof,—the seed of a homer of barley at fifty shekels of silver.
content_old: 16 And if of the field of his possession any man would hallow unto Yahweh then shall thine estimate be according to the seed thereof,—the seed of a homer of barley at fifty shekels of silver.

content: 17 If from the year of jubilee he would hallow his field according to thine estimate shall it stand.
content_old: 17 If from the year of jubilee he would hallow his field according to thine estimate shall it stand.

content: 18 But if after the jubilee he would hallow his field then shall the priest reckon to him the silver､ according to the years that remain, until the year of the jubilee,—and it shall be abated from thine estimate.
content_old: 18 But if after the jubilee he would hallow his field then shall the priest reckon to him the silver､ according to the years that remain, until the year of the jubilee,—and it shall be abated from thine estimate.

content: 19 But if he that hath hallowed it should be pleased to redeem the field then shall he add the fifth part of the silver of thine estimate thereunto､ and it shall be assured to him.
content_old: 19 But if he that hath hallowed it should be pleased to redeem the field then shall he add the fifth part of the silver of thine estimate thereunto､ and it shall be assured to him.

content: 20 But if he will not redeem the field, but have sold the field to another man it shall be redeemable no longer;
content_old: 20 But if he will not redeem the field, but have sold the field to another man it shall be redeemable no longer;

content: 21 so shall the field, when it goeth out in the jubilee, be holy unto Yahweh､ as a devoted､ field,—to the priest shall belong the possession thereof.
content_old: 21 so shall the field, when it goeth out in the jubilee, be holy unto Yahweh､ as a devoted､ field,—to the priest shall belong the possession thereof.

content: 22 If､ however､ a field that he hath bought, which is not of the fields of his possession he would hallow unto Yahweh
content_old: 22 If､ however､ a field that he hath bought, which is not of the fields of his possession he would hallow unto Yahweh

content: 23 then shall the priest reckon to him the amount of thine estimate､ until the year of the jubilee,—and he shall give thine estimate､ in that day, as holy unto Yahweh.
content_old: 23 then shall the priest reckon to him the amount of thine estimate､ until the year of the jubilee,—and he shall give thine estimate､ in that day, as holy unto Yahweh.

content: 24 In the year of the jubilee shall the field return unto him from whom he bought it､ to him whose it was､ as a possession in the land.
content_old: 24 In the year of the jubilee shall the field return unto him from whom he bought it､ to him whose it was､ as a possession in the land.

content: 25 And every estimate of thine shall be by the holy shekel,—twenty gerahs make the shekel.
content_old: 25 And every estimate of thine shall be by the holy shekel,—twenty gerahs make the shekel.

content: 26 Only the firstling which is born a firstling to Yahweh､ among beasts no man shall hallow it,—whether ox or sheep unto Yahweh it belongeth.
content_old: 26 Only the firstling which is born a firstling to Yahweh､ among beasts no man shall hallow it,—whether ox or sheep unto Yahweh it belongeth.

content: 27 But if it be among the beasts that are unclean then shall he ransom it by thine estimate, and add the fifth part of it thereunto,—but if it is not redeemed then shall it be sold by thine estimate.
content_old: 27 But if it be among the beasts that are unclean then shall he ransom it by thine estimate, and add the fifth part of it thereunto,—but if it is not redeemed then shall it be sold by thine estimate.

content: 28 Only no devoted thing which any man shall devote unto Yahweh､ of all that belongeth to him,—of man or beast､ or of the field of his possession shall be either sold or redeemed,—as to every devoted thing most holy it is unto Yahweh.
content_old: 28 Only no devoted thing which any man shall devote unto Yahweh､ of all that belongeth to him,—of man or beast､ or of the field of his possession shall be either sold or redeemed,—as to every devoted thing most holy it is unto Yahweh.

content: 29 As touching any one devoted､ who may be devoted from among men he shall not be ransomed,—he must be surely put to death.
content_old: 29 As touching any one devoted､ who may be devoted from among men he shall not be ransomed,—he must be surely put to death.

content: 30 And as for all the tithe of the land､ whether of the seed of the land､ or of the fruit of the trees unto Yahweh it belongeth,—as something holy unto Yahweh.
content_old: 30 And as for all the tithe of the land､ whether of the seed of the land､ or of the fruit of the trees unto Yahweh it belongeth,—as something holy unto Yahweh.

content: 31 But if any man should be pleased to redeem aught of his tithes the fifth part thereof shall he add thereunto.
content_old: 31 But if any man should be pleased to redeem aught of his tithes the fifth part thereof shall he add thereunto.

content: 32 And as for all the tithe of herd and flock, all that passeth under the rod the tenth shall be holy unto Yahweh.
content_old: 32 And as for all the tithe of herd and flock, all that passeth under the rod the tenth shall be holy unto Yahweh.

content: 33 He shall not examine whether it be good or bad､ neither shall he change it,—or if he do in anywise change it then shall both it and what is given in exchange for it be holy､ it shall not be redeemed.
content_old: 33 He shall not examine whether it be good or bad､ neither shall he change it,—or if he do in anywise change it then shall both it and what is given in exchange for it be holy､ it shall not be redeemed.
